K01vinsutru:7: a ka ras bris ga xiv.1 vinayasūtram guṇaprabha (62 patra)
K01vinsutru:15: Vin_1.2 / sarvasmin* sannipatite saṃghe kṛtedaṃ veṣaṃ nipatya pragṛhītāñjalim utkuṭusthaṃ
K01vinsutru:16: vṛddhāntaṃ yācivantaṃ trir jñapticaturthena karmaṇā saha pravrajyopasaṃpadāv upanayeyur iti purākalpaḥ /
K01vinsutru:17: Vin_1.3 / niśritasya kañcid bhikṣuṃ tatropādhyāyatayā pravrajyopasampadau /
K01vinsutru:22: Vin_1.8 / svayam upāsakatām upanīyārocakāya saṃghasyārpayet* bhikṣave /
K01vinsutru:23: Vin_1.9 / kañcit pariśuddhya tīti pṛṣṭvā śuddham ā[1b3]rocayet* /
K01vinsutru:37: Vin_1.23 / kañcit pariśuddhyatīti pṛṣṭvā śuddham upanayet* /
K01vinsutru:41: Vin_1.27 / abhyupagatāv u[1b5]pādhyāyasya yājñāyāṃ tad udbhūti /
K01vinsutru:42: Vin_1.28 / āvṛttau tṛtīye ṅśe ntyāyāṃ vṛttatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:50: Vin_1.36 / nānuktvā sahitam arthahetor nāma gṛhnāmīty upādhyāyanāma gṛhnīyāt*
K01vinsutru:54: Vin_1.38 / upādhyāyatāyām unmukhībhūtaḥ karmakārakam adhīcched raho nuśāsakañ ca bhikṣuṃ /
K01vinsutru:56: Vin_1.40 / sa svayam enaṃ tricīvaram adhiṣṭhāpayet* /
K01vinsutru:59: Vin_1.42 / supātram ity anevaṃ brūyuḥ sarve /
K01vinsutru:60: Vin_1.43 / apakasite ka ity ākhyāpya raha nuśāsakam utsāhya karmakārakaḥ saṃghaṃ yenam anujñā..payet* /
K01vinsutru:62: Vin_1.45 / tiṣṭha mā śabditā gamiṣyasīty enam uktvā samanuśiṣṭa iti saṃghāya pariśuddhiṃ nivedya kim āgacchatv ity āgamanaṃ pṛcchet* /
K01vinsutru:72: Vin_1.55 / hemantito graismiko vārṣiko mitavārṣik. dīrghavārṣika iti /
K01vinsutru:80: Vin_1.63 / sa[m*]pannatāṃ samyagtayā ca prepsitasyotgrāhya śīlasāmānyagatatārāgaṇe niyuñjīt* /
K01vinsutru:89: Vin_1.70 // nānavalokya niḥśrayaṃ niḥśritaḥ kāraṇīyaṃ kuryāt* /
K01vinsutru:91: Vin_1.72 / dantakāṣṭhavisarjanaṃ sopavicāre vihāre cetyam abhivandanaṃ /
K01vinsutru:92: Vin_1.73 / ekānnaṃ pañcāśavyāmaparyantād vihārato gamanaṃ [2a5] pātracīvarakarmaṇo
K01vinsutru:95: Vin_1.74 / praṇidhātukāme saṃghe ho vata saṃgho syedaṃ praṇidhikarma na kuryād iti /
K01vinsutru:97: Vin_1.76 / parivāsamūlaparivāsamānāpy amūlamānāpy āvartaṇārthini niḥśraye ho vata saṃghasya parivāsādi catuṣkaṃ dadyād ā[2a6]bṛhet iti /
K01vinsutru:98: Vin_1.77 / so py etad asmai kuryād utsṛjyāvalokanaṃ /
K01vinsutru:123: Vin_1.101 / cared a[2b3]niḥśritaḥ pañcavarṣaḥ paścimasamayogena samanvitajanapadacārikaṃ /
K01vinsutru:127: Vin_1.103 / māsi tīrthya iti pravrajyārtham upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcched upasampādakāś ca /
K01vinsutru:128: Vin_1.104 / nānārādhitacittam utsṛjya śākyam āgneyañ ca jaṭilaṃ tīrthyaṃ pravrajayeyur upasaṃpādayeyur vā kṛte tattīrthyānārādhitāditīrthyānta[ra]varjam*
K01vinsutru:129: Vin_1.105 / ratnānāṃ varṇasya [2b4] tīrthyānām avarṇasya bhūtasyoktāv akupyatvamārādhitacittatā /
K01vinsutru:130: Vin_1.106 / tadartham atadvan tam enaṃ kṛtopāsakatāntaṃ caturo māsān parivāsayed* saṃgho datvā parivāsaṃ karmaṇā /
K01vinsutru:134: Vin_1.110 / paripūrṇapañcadaśavarṣo sīti pravrajyartham upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet* /
K01vinsutru:135: Vin_1.111 / nonam asamarthaṃ kākoḍḍāyane samartham vā [2b5] saptavarṣaṃ pravrajayeyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:137: Vin_1.113 / aruciś ced anekadhyaṃ pravrajyāyāṃ pravrajyātiriktam upasam*pādayet* /
K01vinsutru:138: Vin_1.114 / ūnaś ced anyasmā upaniśrityartham arpayet* /
K01vinsutru:140: Vin_1.116 / upasaṃpādayed aprayacchato balād ādāya kṛdhāsaḥ /
K01vinsutru:141: Vin_1.117 / vyasiste kasyacit kicid deyam alpaṃ vā prabhūtam vā /
K01vinsutru:144: Vin_1.120 / nānārocitaṃ dūradeśam apy enaṃ saṃghe pravrājayet* /
K01vinsutru:146: Vin_1.122 / kṛtānujñāte so mātapitṛbhyām ante muktvā dūradeśakaṃ /
K01vinsutru:147: Vin_1.123 / māsi glānam ity upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet* /
K01vinsutru:148: Vin_1.124 / mā te glānyaṃ kañcid astīti vā /
K01vinsutru:157: Vin_1.132 / pāñcavidhyam asya jātyā pakṣāsaktaprādurbhāvīrṣayāpatkṛta iti /
K01vinsutru:160: jānato kṛtatāṃ vidher upasaṃpado prarūḍhatām vā dvitīyāyāṃ saṃghe na sā[3a2]rdhaṃ karmaṇaḥ pratyanubhūtatāyāṃ tatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:162: Vin_1.135 / samāttedaṃ pravrajyasya taddṛṣṭer nikṣipyedaṃ cīvaran tena dhvajena tatrāruṇodgamane tattvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:170: Vin_1.143 / caturṇāṃ [3a3] pārajikānām anyat tam āpattim āpannaḥ /
K01vinsutru:171: Vin_1.144 / bhyupapataḥ syāc cet sāmagrī punaḥ praṇidhānaṃ /
K01vinsutru:175: / khañjaḥ kāṇḍarikaḥ kāṇaḥ kuṇiḥ kubjo tha vā manaḥ /
K01vinsutru:177: / strīchinnā bhārachinnā mārgachinnāś ca ye narāḥ /
K01vinsutru:178: / tālam uktā kandalichinnāḥ evaṃrūpa hi puruṣāḥ pratikṣiptā maharṣiṇā /
K01vinsutru:189: / avadātakeśāś ca ye narā nāgakeśā akeśakā /
K01vinsutru:202: / atigrīvā agrīvāś ca skandhākṣā api kubjakāḥ /
K01vinsutru:205: / caturbhiś ca chavivarṇaiḥ khelā vikaṭakās tathā /
K01vinsutru:211: Vin_1.155 / na dvyaṅgulād ūrdham āraṇyakaḥ keṣān dhārayet* /
K01vinsutru:217: Vin_1.161 / kārayeta vraṇanimittam arūṭṭāv anyathā vijñān* sthavirasthavirān avalokya /
K01vinsutru:219: Vin_1.163 / nānyatra kāye .. kṣurabhāram vā nakhachedaṃ bhajeta vāsimukhaṃ vā /
K01vinsutru:221: Vin_1.165 / bhajeta lekhaṃ malāpakṛṣṭyai na cīvareṇa keśaśmaśrv avatārayet* /
K01vinsutru:226: Vin_1.170 / avatārayeta prasādādau jīrṇo glāno vātātapavarṣeṣu ca /
K01vinsutru:230: Vin_1.174 / nānadhiṣṭhitā bhikṣuṇyaiṣā puruṣeṇāvītarāgā keśāṃ chedayet /
K01vinsutru:231: Vin_1.175 / saṃrajyamānām adhiṣṭhātrī samanuśiṣyān* [3b5] smṛtim upasthāpaya kim asmin* pūtikaḍevare sāram astīti /
K01vinsutru:232: Vin_1.176 / matṛsaṃjñāṃ bhaginyā duhitur veti kalpakaṃ /
K01vinsutru:234: Vin_1.178 / pañcāṅgikam vā śaucaṃ na nagnaḥ snāyāt* /
K01vinsutru:235: Vin_1.179 / na bhikṣuṇī puruṣatīrthe na strītīrthe cūrṇena /
K01vinsutru:239: Vin_1.183 / na bhikṣuṇī yoṣiti cūrṇaṃ kṣipet* /
K01vinsutru:246: Vin_1.189 / patrāṇy abhāve dattvo pūrataḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca pratigupte pradeśe snānaṃ /
K01vinsutru:256: Vin_1.197 / neṭṭanotgharṣeṇa kāyaṃ śodhayet* pādābhyām anyaṃ /
K01vinsutru:259: Vin_1.200 / na kiñcit kenacid āmuṣṭi celavarter bhikṣuṇy utgharṣet* /
K01vinsutru:262: Vin_1.203 / abhāve muhurtam u kuṭukena sthitvā snātraśāṭakena pocchanaṃ /
K01vinsutru:265: Vin_1.206 / bahiḥsaṃvṛttasyāntarviśālasya samudrākṛter vātā nasya mokṣo madhye /
K01vinsutru:278: Vin_1.219 / tṛṇo bhūmer āstaraṇamātrair autpattikenārdratvena temanena vā /
K01vinsutru:291: Vin_1.232 / madhyapātena pratyupatiṣṭhamānam ajñātam atraitgato nirjñānārthaṃ pṛcchet* /
K01vinsutru:299: Vin_1.240 / pīṭhaśuktayoś caukṣatāṃ kṛtva nikṣepo yathāsthāne /
K01vinsutru:300: Vin_1.241 / sarvatraiṣa bhāṇḍe vidhiḥ sarvam upakaraṃ suguptakelā[y]itaṃ kuryāt* /
K01vinsutru:324: Vin_1.265 / na yatra kvacana pādau prākṣālayet* /
K01vinsutru:330: Vin_1.271 / madhye saṃniveṣṭayā kadambapuṣpākārayā kharayā ca /
K01vinsutru:334: Vin_1.275 / pātranirmādanādi yatra pradeśe vihāre kuryāt tasyā mārjanam udakena pralepanam vā /
K01vinsutru:337: Vin_1.278 / na vidyate ratnārthatāyāṃ pralipter ākārasya niyamaḥ /
K01vinsutru:340: Vin_1.281 / trīṇi pātrāṇi jeṣṭham madhyaṃ kanīyaḥ /
K01vinsutru:341: Vin_1.282 / śeṣeṇordhabhāgāntānantarād aṅguṣṭhodarāt pakvatanḍulaprasthasyordhaṃ vā tad dvayāṃ māgadhakasyodvāhi sasūpasavyañjanasyaitan nyāyyaṃ
K01vinsutru:342: Vin_1.283 / [4b6] na bhikṣuṇy ūrdha bhikṣukanīyaso dhārayeta /
K01vinsutru:352: Vin_1.293 / notthitaḥ pātraṃ karṣet prakṣipec choṣayed vā /
K01vinsutru:356: Vin_1.297 / na cocaṃ na hastamukh[o]dakaṃ dadyāt* /
K01vinsutru:367: Vin_1.307 / u[5a2]ttiṣṭhator vihāraparigaṇayor na khananena bhitteḥ /
K01vinsutru:372: Vin_1.312 / lambanam asya kāntārikayā vṛkṣe sādhu /
K01vinsutru:380: Vin_1.320 / na tulyāvalambānām āsv ālayanakānāṃ niveśam upayuṃjīta /
K01vinsutru:393: Vin_1.333 / tailena ghṛṣṭirāsitthasādṛśyāl lohena kuruvindena vā /
K01vinsutru:395: Vin_1.335 / avaguṇṭhya bhūrjena mṛdānulipya pākasya madhyasya /
K01vinsutru:396: Vin_1.336 / ghṛṣṭis tailena guḍamṛdamṛnma[5a5]yasya bhujyamā tve pākyatvaṃ māsaṣaṭkānte /
K01vinsutru:398: Vin_1.338 / varṣāś cetad virūkṣaṇe mrakṣitatvena kāryāntarāle sya saṃyojyatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:404: Vin_1.344 / bhasmanaḥ pūrayitvā sādhu bhedanaṃ ghaṭabhedanakena /
K01vinsutru:408: Vin_1.348 / piṇyākena gomayena vā liptābhyantareṇa upagataśoṣeṇa /
K01vinsutru:414: Vin_1.354 / sāmantakasya prāṇa[5b1]kānām anukampayā sammārjanaṃ sekaś ca /
K01vinsutru:415: Vin_1.355 / prarohasya parivyañjanam ajñāto varṣāgrasyopasaṃpadyaṅgīkaraṇaṃ vyājenāsya pratyavekṣaṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:419: Vin_1.359 / darśanopavicāra enam avakāśane sthāpayeyuḥ gaṇābhimukhaṃ vragṛhītāñjaliṃ* /
K01vinsutru:423: Vin_1.363 / daharam apy abhāve vṛddhataram āpṛcchet* /
K01vinsutru:425: Vin_1.365 / nānavalokya tajjātīyaṃ parikarmayet tena vātmānaṃ /
K01vinsutru:426: Vin_1.366 / nirdoṣam abhāve pravṛttaparyeṣanasya niḥśrayārhasyāniḥśritasya vāse /
K01vinsutru:429: Vin_1.369 / [5b3] viśramyākantuko dvitīye tritīye vāhni niḥśrayaṃ gṛhṇīt* /
K01vinsutru:434: Vin_1.374 / nirjñāya vṛttajñānaparivārānugrāhakatvaṃ prasnādināsya grahaṇaṃ saṃvaravat* /
K01vinsutru:438: Vin_1.378 / tatt[ai]vopādhyāy[e] niḥśritatvaṃ tasmād agrahaṇam asya tatra /
K01vinsutru:443: Vin_1.383 / trir divasena niḥśritam upasaṃkrāmet tadvihārasthaḥ /
K01vinsutru:449: Vin_1.389 / anālāpo navavāda upasthānadharmāmiṣair asaṃbhogaḥ prārabdhakuśalapakṣasamucchedo niḥśrayapratipraśrambhaṇañ ca /
K01vinsutru:451: Vin_1.391 / kusītasya durvacaso nādṛtasya pāpamitrasya ca /
K01vinsutru:453: Vin_1.393 / anādṛtau bhikṣoḥ praguṇīkaraṇā[5b6]ya prayogo bhijñasya /
K01vinsutru:459: Vin_1.399 / pariśrāvaṇakuṇḍike datvā sāntarottarañ ca śrāmaṇerasya /
K01vinsutru:470: Vin_1.409 / pramaṇam asya dvādaśakād aṅgulīnāṃ prabhṛtyāṣṭakāta) /
K01vinsutru:480: Vin_1.419 / na tīkṣṇena dantaṃ jihvāṃ karṇañ cotghṛṣet* /
K01vinsutru:483: Vin_1.422 / nāprakṣālya digdhaṃ mukhamalena pradeśam a[6a3]vaguṇṭhya vā pāṃśunā dantajihvayoḥ yavanaṃ chorayet* /
K01vinsutru:486: Vin_1.425 / uccārapraśrāvakheṭasiṃ*ghāṇakavāntam viriktam a[p]y anyac ca /
K01vinsutru:487: Vin_1.426 / nirmādanasyāto pi saṃpattir ūṣāḍukagomayād api /
K01vinsutru:490: Vin_1.429 / ato nantaraṃ kālyam upasaṃkramya vandanaṃ /
K01vinsutru:498: Vin_1.438 / sāhyaṃ ced abhirucitaṃ tenaiva saha praveśaḥ /
K01vinsutru:514: Vin_1.454 / asammatam utthānakārakatvena grihītasammārjanīkaṃ dṛṣṭvālpotsukaṃ kuryāt* /
K01vinsutru:521: Vin_1.461 / śanaiḥ saṃ[6b1]prajānan* praviś[e]n niṣkrāmec cāsaṃgharṣayaṃ dvāraśākhe /
K01vinsutru:539: Vin_1.478 / tadupasaṃhāraḥ vyutthāpanāyām āpatter ānulomikājīvitapariskārasaṃpattau codyogaḥ /
K01vinsutru:543: Vin_1.482 / [6b3] sā hy aśaktau niḥśritaṃ yena pravṛttiḥ /
K01vinsutru:552: Vin_1.491 / yānakachatrāro[6b4]paṇādikārān enam udiśya kuryuḥ sāṃghikāt* /
K01vinsutru:554: Vin_1.493 / deyatvam ā[bhy]ām āttasya tenāmṛtyau sati vibhave /
K01vinsutru:556: Vin_1.495 / nārthyām asya dharmāñ cājñāṃ vilomayet* /
K01vinsutru:560: Vin_1.499 / sāṃghikād enam asau māraṇāśaṃkāyāṃ śayanāsanād utthāpya [6b5] pautgalike niveśayeta /
K01vinsutru:570: Vin_1.509 / drutaś cet* syād āgamaya yāvat sthavirāgaccha[6b6]tītenaṃ brūyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:571: Vin_1.510 / pāṇyudakadāne ca gatatve bhyavahārāyāsti cet* kālaḥ -
K01vinsutru:574: Vin_1.513 / duḥprāvritatve durnivastatāyāṃ vā sauṣṭhavārtham anayor nimittam asmai kurvīt* /
K01vinsutru:576: Vin_1.515 / asaṃpattau svayaṃ nainān* saṃlāpayen navakān* /
K01vinsutru:577: Vin_1.516 / yatreṣām vihārāraṇyayor vṛttis tat vṛttaṃ grāhayen niyuñjī /
K01vinsutru:579: Vin_1.518 / gamiko diksārthāvāsaśayanāsanaṃ sahāyakāBś ca glānyena pahāyitvena tolayitvā prakrāmet* /
K01vinsutru:580: Vin_1.519 / sarva paścāt mā kasyacit kiñcit pramuṣitam ity apetya dūram utsārayet* /
K01vinsutru:584: Vin_1.523 / varṣopagato nusaṃjñā ya vihāram apratisaṃskurvataḥ saṃskārayet* /
K01vinsutru:589: Vin_1.528 / akaraṇe niṣṭau vā dharmyām ebhyaḥ kathaṃ kṛtvedam asmākaṃ saṃvidyata iti brūyāt* /
K01vinsutru:601: Vin_1.540 / anuddhataḥ kule syād anunnaḍā[7a4]n avasthitaḥ /
K01vinsutru:609: Vin_1.548 / gṛhī cet* dharmyām asmai kathaṃ kuryāt* /
K01vinsutru:610: Vin_1.549 / [7a5] anāgacchaty atra grāmāntikas saṃrañjanīyaṃ yathāśakti pravartayet* /
K01vinsutru:613: Vin_1.552 / upagacched vilomāṃ parijanakriyāṃ na cet svaparopaghātāya /
K01vinsutru:614: Vin_1.553 / asmai cec chaktau samucchidyaināṃ dharmyām utpādya tayā saṃjñapayeta /
K01vinsutru:615: Vin_1.554 / bhaṅge praroge vā tannidānaṃ parijanasya pratisaṃska[7a6]raṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:618: Vin_1.557 / saṃghārāme parādhyāṃs tathā kuryād yathā svayaṃ grāhikayā grahaṇaṃ gaccheta /
K01vinsutru:619: Vin_1.558 / agacchantam anārocya sahasā kasyacit kumāramitrāmatyabhaṭṭarājaputrapādamūlikān* grāhayitvā śuddhikāyāṃ parṣadi nihanyāt* /
K01vinsutru:621: Vin_1.560 / upasaṃpady anyasya tadyācanādau karmakartuḥ [7b1] atrācayas saṃghaḥ /
K01vinsutru:623: Vin_1.562 / śikṣamāṇātvaṃ nāma striyām aparaṃ parva /
K01vinsutru:625: Vin_1.564 / śrāmaṇerikātvabhikṣuṇītvayor antarāle varṣadvayañ caraṇasya kālaḥ /
K01vinsutru:668: Vin_1.606 / na puruṣānukṛtitvaṃ striyā stryanukṛtitvaṃ ca puruṣasya vyañjanāntaraprakāraḥ /
K01vinsutru:681: Vin_1.619 / arhatvaṃ pravrajy[o]pasaṃpador upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti /
K01vinsutru:699: Vin_2.8 / śikṣā pratyācakṣe buddhaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ sūtraṃ vinayaṃ mātṛkām ācāryam upādhyāyam āgārikamāndhārayaśramaṇoddeśaṃ ṣaṇḍkapaṇḍakaṃ bhikṣuṇīdūṣakaṃ /
K01vinsutru:700: steyasaṃvāsikaṃ nānāsaṃvāsikam asaṃvāsikaṃ tīrthikaṃ tīrthikāvakrāntagaṃ mātṛghātakaṃ
K01vinsutru:702: alaṃ me yusmadvidhaiḥ brahmacāritiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvāsena vāsabhogena ceti pratyākhyānavacanāni /
K01vinsutru:715: Vin_2.19 / nāgupto divā pārśvaṃ dattvā middham avakramet* /
K01vinsutru:717: Vin_2.21 / baddhadvāraparivṛtasthatvam ārakṣitatvaṃ bhikṣūṇā grathitatvam adhonivasanasya /
K01vinsutru:720: Vin_2.22 / na yatra striyā kāmyeta tatro[8a5]pasaṃkrāmeta /
K01vinsutru:721: Vin_2.23 / na yatrāmanuṣo sparśāyodyataḥ tatra nivaset* /

K01vinsutru:977: Vin_2.259 / grāsānupradānena nayatāśvam adhirūḍhena caivam eṣa hartavyam iti kāyaviprakāre /

K01vinsutru:1070: tā tathātvasaṃpādane mṛyatām ity anusthānaiḥ glānasya /
K01vinsutru:1075: Vin_2.345 / na glānāya sahasā [11a4] śastrakaṃ rajum vā dadyāt* /

K01vinsutru:1090: sārdham ālapāmi saṃlapāmi pratisaṃmode sātatyam api samāpadye mayā sārdham ity ukte /

K01vinsutru:1095: Vin_2.361 / parāvadeśatvam asty asāv ity upasandhāne svasya /

K01vinsutru:1107: Vin_2.369 / yadi bhadanto rhan piṇḍa[11b2]pā[t]aṃ me gṛhāṇa praviśa gṛhām āsane niṣīda
K01vinsutru:1108: stodakaṃ gṛhāṇa bhojanaṃ pratigṛhāṇa sūpikaṃ bhuṃ[k]ṣvānumodasva niṣkrāmeti tadvat saṃpādane //

K01vinsutru:1184: Vin_2.429 / ājñāne subhaṣita[12a3]durbhāśitayor arthasya trayo n.ye nyatra pratisevane methunasyeti pratibalatve maulasya /

K01vinsutru:1237: Vin_2.470 / yavān dehi dehi bhagini mahyaṃ yatte bhagini paśyāmi tad dehi yat te

K01vinsutru:1262: Vin_2.490 / na phalekyāt pratikartṛsamāpte vyāpārasya lopaḥ /

K01vinsutru:1343: Vin_2.551 / naiṣu na nājñapayeyur methakena karmaṇā ca /

K01vinsutru:1356: Vin_2.558 / coditatve bhikṣuṇādhiśīlam avacanīyatvasyātra bhikṣubhir ātmanaḥ kṛteḥ /

K01vinsutru:1399: Vin_2.591 / anyādhiṣṭhānam utsṛjya cīvarasthānaprāptyasaṃbhave prati[14a1] / / vidhiḥ /
K01vinsutru:1400: Vin_2.592 / dānam avipravāsasaṃvṛtteḥ saṃghāṭyā gurukatve jīrṇaṃ vādhikayoḥ /

K01vinsutru:1413: Vin_2.605 / kuḍyaparikṣipto grāme yāvat ṣaḍgavayuktena vaṃśaśakaṭena[14a3] sphuraṇam
K01vinsutru:1414: adhvanā vā kukkuṭasyotpātya nilayane vāṭaparikṣipte jaiḍakarajāsaṃprakṛtihrīmatpuruṣapravicārabhūmyadhvanā vā /
K01vinsutru:1415: Vin_2.606 / parikhāparikṣipte dvādaśapadikayā niḥśrayaṇyā cchoritasaṃkārasthūlaloṣṭādhvano vā /
K01vinsutru:1416: Vin_2.607 / tatsthāne trikaraṇīyaparisarpaṇātinā mana rajobhiś ca yāvatas tadagatasya saṃbhāvanaṃ /
K01vinsutru:1420: Vin_2.609 / na sīmāntaraṃ pṛthaktvaṃ krośāntān madhyataḥ parasya /
K01vinsutru:1437: Vin_2.621 / pūrṇavadasatyāṃ pūrakapratyāsāṃ māṃ nyūnaṃ māṃ samasāmantakāt* /
K01vinsutru:1451: Vin_2.635 / na nyāyyam utpāṭayed atraiva parikarma kṛtvāropayiṣya ity anusampādya cittaṃ /
K01vinsutru:1453: Vin_2.637 / khaṇḍasaṃghāṭyāṃ nava prabhṛtyāṃ pañcāviṃ*śater yug*mavarjaṃ /
K01vinsutru:1461: Vin_2.645 / antarvāsaso dvipañcakam api dvicatuṣkañ ca /
K01vinsutru:1478: Vin_2.656 / jñātir āsaptamābhyāṃ pitṛbhyām anyatareṇāpy ekapūrvajaḥ /
K01vinsutru:1479: Vin_2.657 / saṃjñānasya kartatvaṃ prādhānyena / / vṛṃde tat /
K01vinsutru:1490: Vin_2.668 / anissaraṇam atrāgantukatvaṃ sadasatvarūpanirjñānārtham asya tena praśnaḥ /
K01vinsutru:1494: jyamānam atirekaṃ pātracīva śikyasaritakāyabandhanaṃ saṃgha upanikṣepāya /
K01vinsutru:1495: Vin_2.672 / tathopanikṣepa tasya yatheṣṭaṃ tadvikalair ādānaṃ /
K01vinsutru:1503: Vin_2.675 / pratigṛhṇīyād bhikṣuṇī mahārhaṃ vāsaḥ parivarhaṇāya kuryād bhikṣuṇyā sārddhaṃ parivarttaṃ /
K01vinsutru:1509: Vin_2.680 / cittaśraddham udbhāvya purataḥ sthāpayitva nira[15a3]pekṣaṇaṃ prakramaṇe
K01vinsutru:1515: Vin_2.685 / anāpattis tāvat kālikacittena vismṛtya mūlyādāne
K01vinsutru:1533: Vin_2.699 / paraṃ gṛhiṇo dvādaśahastakaḥ paḍakottaram antaraṃ saptadvikaṣāṭakaḥ /
K01vinsutru:1538: Vin_2.704 / pūrvakasya ca pūrvalabdhau uttaralabdhāv adhikasya deyatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:1545: Vin_2.710 / saṃkalpitam apravāritasya jñātaṃ tulyam asaṃkalpitena /

K01vinsutru:1559: Vin_2.720 / vṛttāyām evaṃ pratiniḥśriṣṭau prayacchata uktapratiniḥsargād abhyupetadātṛcittagrahaṇānuṣṭhānāt pratigṛhṇīyāt* /
K01vinsutru:1598: Vin_2.749 / alabdhasamvṛtteḥ saty anyatra svakām atyakte vāna krānte /
K01vinsutru:1614: Vin_2.761 / prayogasyārddhaṃ duṣkṛtam ṛddher anyena nabhasā haraṇe nirmite ca /
K01vinsutru:1617: Vin_2.764 / ṣaṭ caturaṅgulo hasto rdhacaturtha<<ḥ>> hastakaḥ puruṣaś ca caturhastakaṃ dhanus tat śatapañcakaṃ krośaḥ /
K01vinsutru:1618: Vin_2.765 / tadantādi caraṇyasya na kāyabhāraṃ vaheta /

K01vinsutru:1650: Vin_2.794 / svīkṛtasyāsyānyasya vā paribhogaś cet* [16b2] bhaiṣajyaśarāvakaparibhogeṇa
K01vinsutru:1666: Vin_2.808 / bandhakaṃ dviguṇam ādāya sākṣisamvatsaraṃ āsadivasasaṃghasthavirovārika gṛhītṛdhanalā[16b4]bhānāropya patre /
K01vinsutru:1670: Vin_2.810 / anyena dadyāt sāṃghikaṃ saṃghabhaktopakrīṇate dhānyaṃ mūlyena /
K01vinsutru:1679: Vin_2.819 / akaraṇaṃ parārthe py utsṛjya ratnatrayaṃ paṇāpaṇaḥ /
K01vinsutru:1692: Vin_2.828 / nādhilobhaṃ kurvīt pariskāre tyadhyāvasānaṃ na patrād astadhāyet* /

K01vinsutru:2652: Vin_2.1645 / na sopacārāt parasya layanamātrāt pṛthagbhūtādhyāsitasya /

K01vinsutru:3131: Vin_2.2036 / śrāddhasya vighātaś cedd asya dāne kula[33b1]śikṣāsamvṛtiṃ dadyuḥ /

K01vinsutru:3153: Vin_2.2054 / [33b4] tathā nivasanaṃ nivasīta yathā parimaṇḍalaṃ saṃsthitaṃ syāt* /

K01vinsutru:3190: Vin_2.2090 / nānāgate khādanīye bhojanīye pā[34a2]tram upanāmayet* /
K01vinsutru:3196: Vin_2.2096 / na bhūyaskāmatayaudanena sūpikaṃ sūpikena caudanaṃ pratichādayeta /
K01vinsutru:3200: Vin_2.2100 / na sālopena mukhena vācaṃ [34a3] niścārayet* /

K01vinsutru:3238: Vin_2.2138 / na puruṣadaghnād ūrdhaṃ vṛkṣasyādhirohed anyatrāpadaḥ /

K01vinsutru:3255: Vin_2.2152 / na bālam apy anyanna spṛśet* /

K01vinsutru:3325: Vin_2.2208 / ratnapratyākhyānam idaṃ tulyatvam anyaśramaṇānāṃ tatra brahmacaryacariṣyatva(ṃ)
K01vinsutru:3352: Vin_2.2222 / pratyarddhamāsam ārye hany anadhiṣṭhito vādhiṣṭhānikasya /
K01vinsutru:3367: Vin_2.2231 / bhikṣuṇī mahājanārthaṃ samādāpya svatra pariṇamanam* /

K01vinsutru:3469: Vin_2.2309 / anāpattir anayā sārddham anekayāpi kṛtāvaraṇatāyāṃ vṛśyādinopasthitasmṛtir anāsvādane 'ṅgasaṃsparśasyācalamañ ce prākṛte saṃstare vā /
K01vinsutru:3497: Vin_2.2330 / paribhujya dharmaśravaṇadānāvasthāyāgā[36b4]rikaśayanāsanam utsṛjyān avalokya gṛhiṇe prakramaṇe /
K01vinsutru:3501: Vin_2.2333 / anāpatti[ḥ] loṭhakāṣṭhañ ca kasyārthe pratigupte pradeśe /

K01vinsutru:3516: Vin_2.2345 / k[ā]lānukālam asya śocanaṃ rañjanañ ca /
K01vinsutru:3545: Vin_2.2366 / na bhikṣoḥ purastād gocare caret /
K01vinsutru:3548: Vin_2.2369 / niṣāda enāṃ sthitātināmane niṣaṇṇo nimuñcīta /
K01vinsutru:3577: Vin_2.2390 / devakulādau tīrthyāśraye gatvā vādasya karaṇe /
K01vinsutru:3579: Vin_2.2392 / dattvāsanaṃ prati sammodya pṛṣṭāgamābhiyogam avakāśaṃ kārayet /
K01vinsutru:3583: Vin_2.2395 / anāpattiḥ glānye sphuṭatve ca nīlatṛṇaiḥ sarvasya /
K01vinsutru:3593: / taddhinavanītaḥ sarpis tailaṃ madhuthāni tamāṃ samatsyavallūrāṇāñ ca /
K01vinsutru:3610: dhāraṇaṃ vipravāsañ ca sparśam agner nivārite /
K01vinsutru:3611: bhojanaṃ vījāghātañ ca deśe ca harite śuceḥ //
K01vinsutru:3612: utsargaṃ vṛkṣarohañc a śaikṣā uddeśayos saha /
K01vinsutru:3626: Vin_2.2413 / tadvṛttam utthāyaiva sekasanmā[38a2]rgasukumārī gomayākārṣīṃ prahāṇam /
K01vinsutru:3634: Vin_2.2421 / tisraḥ parivṛttayor dvau prahāram ity aparam /
K01vinsutru:3642: Vin_2.2429 / asaṃpattau gaṇḍīdānena saṃbodhanasya mahāsannipāte yamalaśaṃkhayor āpūrṇam /
K01vinsutru:3646: Vin_2.2433 / saṃbhāvini kāryasya kāle 'vaśiṣṭe yathāsukhaṃ karaṇaṃ dattatridaṇḍake /
K01vinsutru:3662: tatjñaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ parikīrttite sannidhau saṃghasya sthāvare cihne karmaṇaḥ [38a6] karaṇam /
K01vinsutru:3668: Vin_2.2452 / yujyate dvayoḥ sīmnor ekena vacasā bandho mokṣo vā /
K01vinsutru:3688: Vin_2.2470 / yathākathaṃcid etad dānānām aśaktau saṃpādanam /
K01vinsutru:3690: Vin_2.2472 / kathaṃcid apy aśaktau saṃghasya vā tatra gamanaṃ [38b3] tasya vā mañcenānayanam /
K01vinsutru:3707: Vin_2.2489 / pareṇa pañcadaśyāṃ gṛhītatve bhikṣor muñcainaṃ bhikṣuṃ sabrahmacāryeṣasmākam iti brūyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:3708: Vin_2.2490 / amuktāvasty asmākam anena sārddhaṃ kiñcid eva karaṇīya[38b5]m iti sādyaṃ /
K01vinsutru:3710: Vin_2.2492 / norddham asya mokṣāya na vyāyaccheyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:3712: Vin_2.2494 / pṛthagbhāvarucim abhinirūpya karmaṇaḥ kṛtau sthūlātyayaḥ /
K01vinsutru:3713: Vin_2.2495 / na vicikitsitaṃ niścitaṃ vā kalpamānatve 'nutthiter doṣasya kartṛ /
K01vinsutru:3714: Vin_2.2496 / kartṛśuddheḥ paryṣitaṃ bhāvato na kalpataḥ /
K01vinsutru:3718: Vin_2.2498 / poṣadhaṃ kurvīran pañcadaśyām anvarddhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśena /
K01vinsutru:3721: Vin_2.2501 / bhāṣaṇenaiva nidānoddeśasyoccāraṇena saṃpādanīyatvaṃ jñapteś ca /
K01vinsutru:3763: Vin_2.2543 / yogyatvaṃ sarvāṅgeṣu grahaṇagamane sevāyāṃ pratibalatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:3774: Vin_2.2554 / ardhatvam vāhyake pravrājite gṛhītvasyārūḍhidhvastayoś ca /
K01vinsutru:3797: Vin_2.2575 / vātāyanañ ca vi tṛtīye ūrdham bahissamvṛtam antarviśālaṃ sādhu /
K01vinsutru:3803: Vin_2.2581 / bahirvā ca prahāṇamaṇḍapasya layanapaṅkter vā /
K01vinsutru:3811: Vin_2.2589 / mauñjaṃ sāṇaṃ vālvajaṃ paṭṭikā vetravaibhaṅgukam iti /
K01vinsutru:3815: Vin_2.2593 / ūrṇā śaṇaḥ karpyāso natukāni patravaibhaṅgukañ ca /
K01vinsutru:3816: Vin_2.2594 / kākapadakānā[39b5]m antaro ntare yathārtham avasthāpanāya dānam /
K01vinsutru:3820: Vin_2.2598 / sanaiḥ aduḥkhanārthamāḍhakaṃ chitter veṣṭitāyāś ca natukaiḥ /
K01vinsutru:3831: Vin_2.2609 / svaṃ cedekamatadvantaṃ pañcadaśāṃ manyeta [prema]sapremakaprāguṇye prayatet* /
K01vinsutru:3832: Vin_2.2610 / ya āyusman idaṃ cedañ ca karoti kiṃ* tasya bhavati sāpattiko natvāyusmatedaṃ
K01vinsutru:3833: cedaṃ ca kṛtaṃ kṛtam evaṃ [40a2] saty āyusmān* sāpattiko nāham āyusmann eko pi tu
K01vinsutru:3834: sarvasaṃgho nenārthenāṅgatāvattvam āyusmān svām āpattiṃ* yathādharmaṃ pratikuru kin
K01vinsutru:3835: te kariṣyati sarvasaṃgha iti prakrameṇa darśanapathe śiṣṭānām icchāyāṃ deśayet* /
K01vinsutru:3837: Vin_2.2612 / sarve cet* pañcadaśyām āpattim* pratīyur vimatim vā svapratikriyārtham āvāsāntare kañcit prasthāpayeyuḥ pratigṛhī[40a3]tṛsaṃvatyartham
K01vinsutru:3839: Vin_2.2614 / catuṣkato rvāgbhāve vihārakaraṇīyaṃ sthitam eva /
K01vinsutru:3841: Vin_2.2616 / seka-saṃmārgasukumārīgomayakārṣāpradānasiṃ*hāsanāsanaprajñapanapradīpadharmaśravaṇadāneṣu kriteṣūccatarake pradeśe sthitvā caturdiśaṃ vyavalokanam /
K01vinsutru:3842: Vin_2.2617 / darśana bhikṣuṇām aṅga tāvad āyusmanta[40a4]s tvaritatvaritam āgacchatām āryasaṃghasya poṣadhaḥ pravaraṇā vā pāñcadaśika iti vacanaṃ
K01vinsutru:3849: Vin_2.2624 / nāsatprātimokṣasūtroddeśake tadāsthāne jñātvā poṣadham āgamayet* /
K01vinsutru:3859: Vin_2.2633 / trikam ardhayojanaṃ krośam ardhakro[40a6]śaṃ pariṣaṇḍām vā /
K01vinsutru:3865: Vin_2.2639 / śāstṛdharatvam eṣāṃ bhikṣum īrṣyantaṃ bodhayeyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:3866: Vin_2.2640 / nākṛtapoṣadhaḥ pravāraṇas taddine prajñāyamānasv ata(da)
K01vinsutru:3867: ḥ sthānāt prakrāmen na cet tadaiva tadvadhe prāptiḥ kalikṛtbhyo vimuktir anuprāptiḥ [40b1] sat*vṛttānā tat parāyanatvam vā /
K01vinsutru:3869: Vin_2.2642 / nābhikṣukaṃ sabhikṣukād asahitaḥ śiṣṭair anyatrāpadaḥ kāyacittaprasrabdhivaśatā ta vā /
K01vinsutru:3871: Vin_2.2644 / tat*rūpatāyāṃ pratyayasya sadvṛttoddeśavantam upadiśya vāsaṃ tatrāvatāre niyuñjīt* /
K01vinsutru:3873: Vin_2.2646 / kalpatāpaścād āgatānām arthe punaḥ karaṇam anayoḥ /
K01vinsutru:3874: Vin_2.2647 / kāmo tra pravṛtto samyaktā cet* /
K01vinsutru:3902: Vin_2.2673 / yaḥ kaści[t*] [40b5] nānādhīṣṭho na cet tanmukhikayā nirgatiḥ /
K01vinsutru:3911: Vin_2.2682 / āstaram atra dadyāt* vālukācchayikā vā /
K01vinsutru:3916: Vin_2.2687 / nādhyeṣyamāṇo sya bhāṣaṇārthaṃ na pratīccheta /
K01vinsutru:3926: Vin_2.2696 / muhūrttaṃ sthaviro gregataṃ tūṣṇīm āga yyātra dharmaṃ bhāṣetānyam vādhīcched vada bhikṣo dharmaṃ
K01vinsutru:3927: Vin_2.2697 / bhāṣamāṇam avadhārya dharmaś ced utsāhayet* /
K01vinsutru:3929: Vin_2.2699 / gṛhiṇām a[41a2]trāgatānāṃ dharmaṃ kathaṃ kuryāt* /
K01vinsutru:3930: Vin_2.2700 / tīrthyañ ca pratyavatiṣṭhamānaṃ sunigṛhītam adarśayat kopam ananusūyam* /
K01vinsutru:3931: Vin_2.2701 / na parṣadam ādāya deśako gacchet* /
K01vinsutru:3950: Vin_2.2720 / vihārasvāmidevatārthañ ca gāthābhāṣaṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ niyogasya vacanaṃ /
K01vinsutru:3952: Vin_2.2722 / adya śuklapakṣasya pratipad vihārasvāmino vihāradevatānāṃ cārthāya gāthāṃ bhā<<ṣa>>dhvam iti /
K01vinsutru:3954: Vin_2.2724 / evaṃ nāma dānapati śvo bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhaktenopanimantrayate taṃ bhadanta kalyā[41a5]ṇaiḥ manobhiḥ pratyanukampāntām iti /
K01vinsutru:3958: Vin_2.2728 / nāvicāryānāgamyya poṣadhaṃ śūnyo yam ita sīmānaṃ badhnīyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:3962: Vin_2.2732 / na kalpate sīmnā sīmnaḥ parikṣepaḥ /
K01vinsutru:3971: Vin_2.2741 / anuvṛddhir asya dhvasto punaḥ kṛto /
K01vinsutru:3974: Vin_2.2744 satvenaivātra na vyavahāraḥ kutaḥ saṃvardhatayā /
K01vinsutru:3975: Vin_2.2745 / nordhaṃ madhyato rdhatṛtīyayojanāntāt sīmno bandhasya rūḍhiḥ /
K01vinsutru:3982: Vin_2.2752 / yasya kasyacid atas tadārocakatvena bhavanīyatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:3983: Vin_2.2753 / nainaṃ bahiḥsīmastho dadīta dāpayeta vā /
K01vinsutru:3987: Vin_2.2757 / nirdoṣaṃ bahiḥsīmnā nayā bhītyā nayanam* /
K01vinsutru:3988: Vin_2.2758 / bhikṣūṇāṃ gaṇanam upadhivārikeṇa poṣadhe śalākācāraṇe /
K01vinsutru:3999: Vin_2.2769 / anayas sapratyapāyatāyāṃ prāsādikasthānalobhenāsamīpe grāmasya yodhvakaraṇam* /
K01vinsutru:4000: Vin_2.2770 / karaṇam anavasthāne sārthe sya gacchatbhiḥ /
K01vinsutru:4003: Vin_2.2773 / [41b5] niravadyaṃ srāddhasya pradhānasya ca tuṣṭisaṃbhāvanāyām ācārānuśrāvaṇam* /
K01vinsutru:4019: Vin_3.6 / vihāraṃ kelāyeyuḥ daśāhārdhamāsena bhaviṣyat tāyāṃ /
K01vinsutru:4021: Vin_3.8 / pūrve hni śayanāsanasya pāta m* /
K01vinsutru:4026: Vin_3.11 / so ktagandhaiś cāṅgerīpaṭalakagate śukle vāsasy upanikṣiptāḥ śalākā vṛddhānte
K01vinsutru:4027: niveśyā yañ cāyaṃ cāsminn āvāse kriyākāro yo yusmākam utsahate tena kriyākāreṇāsminn
K01vinsutru:4028: āvāse varṣāvastuṃ sa śalākāṃ grihṇātu na ca vaḥ kenacid antarvarṣe saṃghamadhye raṇam
K01vinsutru:4029: utpā[42a2]dayitavyo yo vaḥ kasyacit kiñcij jānāti sa idānīṃ* vadanta yo ntarvarṣe
K01vinsutru:4030: saṃghe raṇam utpādayiṣyati tasya saṃgha uttara upaparīkṣitavyaṃ matsyata iti bhikṣūn vedayeta /
K01vinsutru:4031: Vin_3.12 / grahaṇopaśamanaṃ prati saṃghaṃ jñapayed anyaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4037: Vin_3.16 / naivāsikānā[42a3]m asy etad ante śanaiḥ sthāpanama /
K01vinsutru:4038: Vin_3.17 / gaṇayitvā pravedanam iyadbhir bhikṣubhir asminn āvāse śalākā gṛhīteti /
K01vinsutru:4041: Vin_3.18 / anta tasya tattāḍakakuñjikena purataḥ sthitvā rocanopakramaṃ
K01vinsutru:4042: sthavirāmuko vihāraḥ salābhaḥ sacīvariko gṛhāṇeti yathāguṇam* /
K01vinsutru:4045: Vin_3.19 / jñātvoddeśam astūpasaṃghārthe gatasya gantryā bhāgitvaṃ [42a4] vṛkṣamūlaharitasārdhalasthaṇḍileṣv api yathāvṛddhikoddeśaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4046: Vin_3.20 / dvādibhyo <<'>>saṃbhāvane layanasyāntato niṣyadanaprāmāṇye sya bhūmeḥ /
K01vinsutru:4051: Vin_3.25 / [42a5] naitat tv āprāptyabhāve na dadīran* /
K01vinsutru:4052: Vin_3.26 / nainam upasthāyakam vāsya karma kārayeran /
K01vinsutru:4053: Vin_3.27 / na kuṣṭhī sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ paribhuñjīta /
K01vinsutru:4055: Vin_3.29 / na sasave py atra sāṃghike tiṣṭhed āprāsādapuṣkiriṇīdvārakoṣṭhakapariṣaṇḍacaṃkramasthānavṛkṣāt* /
K01vinsutru:4058: Vin_3.32 / [42a6] pātracīvarasthāpanārtham āraṇyakebhyaḥ sarvadā layanam uddiśeyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:4059: Vin_3.33 / varṣopagamane syuḥ kecid āgantava iti vastu śayanāsanañ ca sthāpayeyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:4066: Vin_3.40 / pūrvāhṇe kvacit pāṭhasvādhyāyāvasthānacaṃkramāṇāṃ kvacid madhyāhne paratrānyatra cīvarasthāpanam āvāso paratra rātrāv ity asya yogaḥ
K01vinsutru:4074: Vin_3.48 / nordhvam enāṃ prakrāntatvād eṣām anuvarttayeran* /
K01vinsutru:4077: Vin_3.51 / ayam amutrartāv ahaurātre tadavayave vā bhaviṣyaty ayam amutrāyām ācāryasya
K01vinsutru:4078: bhaviṣyaty ayam upādhyāyasya sā[42b3]rdham vihāriṇo yam ayam antevāsina ālaptakāder
K01vinsutru:4086: Vin_3.56 / satve nekasya vṛddhapīṭhānām apy uddeśatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4088: Vin_3.58 / na sāṃghikam ava[42b4]naddhaṃ nāśanadharmaṇe śucinā śrāmaṇerāya śayanāsanaṃ kaścid dadyāt* /
K01vinsutru:4090: Vin_3.60 / dānam asyai vihārasyātra vāsasampattau paryante /
K01vinsutru:4092: Vin_3.62 / na vaṣ kenacit sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam vinā pratyāstaraṇena paribhoktavyaṃ na kalpapratyāstaraṇena na malapratyāstaraṇeneti vedayeta
K01vinsutru:4094: Vin_3.64 / [42b5] samayam utkramya paribhuktāvāchindyād ārocya niḥśraye niḥśritasyānyasya saṃghe /
K01vinsutru:4095: Vin_3.65 / amukena dānapatināmukena vaiyyapṛtyakareṇāmukena gocaragrāmakena svaḥ saṃgho varṣā upagamiṣyatīty ārocayet* /
K01vinsutru:4103: Vin_3.69 / na yasminn abhikṣukatvam akapāṭakatvañ ca sahitam* /
K01vinsutru:4118: Vin_3.83 / laṅghayed etad bhaktabhaiṣajyopasthāyakābhāve śaktau tair vinā yāpayitum* /
K01vinsutru:4120: Vin_3.85 / anu lomikacittotpādanapāpikavāgniścāraṇayoḥ bhedāya parākramamāṇe saṃghasya /
K01vinsutru:4121: Vin_3.86 / naitac chāntyai sasambhāvano na gacchet* /
K01vinsutru:4123: Vin_3.88 / na prati<<śūtā>> varṣāvāse [43a4] nāvāsasya sambandhanam* /
K01vinsutru:4124: Vin_3.89 / na kurvīt* nāsty asyaikapoṣadhatāyām āvāsayor utthānam* /
K01vinsutru:4138: Vin_3.101 / na nāvyutsṛjya prāptapṛthivīm upanibaddhām vā bhūmisthe sthire saṃjanato ntarāpayāyitvam* /
K01vinsutru:4139: Vin_3.102 / dhvansas tad dṛśam abhiniḥsṛtyādharmapakṣasaṃkrāntāv aruṇodgatau [43a6] na saṃdigdhatāyām* /
K01vinsutru:4150: Vin_3.113 / anāśaṃkyam anākṣiptatvaṃ tīrthyasya dṛṣṭer vivecanārthaṃ jñāteḥ karaṇīyenāgamādhigamayor ātmanaḥ kāṃkṣāvinodanārthaṃ gamanāyaitatkṛteḥ
K01vinsutru:4158: Vin_4.2 / śuddhi[43b2]m uktyor anena pratyavagatau sthūlātyayaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4162: Vin_4.6 / yataḥ prabhṛti kelāyanam iyatbhiḥ divasaiḥ saṃghasya pravāraṇā bhaviṣyati yuṣmākam ārocitam bhavatv iti /
K01vinsutru:4165: Vin_4.9 / rāhānāṃ ci[43b3]traṇaṃ stūpānāṃ moccanamolanaṃ ca /
K01vinsutru:4167: Vin_4.11 / adya sarvarātrikaṃ dharmaśravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sāmagrī deyeti gocarārocya sūtravinayamātrakadharair adhiṣṭacaturdaśyāṃ sarvarātrikadharmaśravaṇadāpanam* /
K01vinsutru:4168: Vin_4.12 / parasyāntaiḥ prākkarmato dhamyayā viniścayakathayā rātrer atināmanam* /
K01vinsutru:4181: Vin_4.25 / sarvasaṃghena prativārite etat tvasya saṃghe nivedanam* /
K01vinsutru:4185: / svakyena vastunā vastapravāraṇam ārabheta vacanato gṛhītvā ḥ [43b6] saṃghena labhyaṃ bhadantā evaṃ rūpeṇāpi vastunā varṣoṣitam
K01vinsutru:4191: Vin_4.32 / aśakyatāyām avasthātuṃ bhāgaprāptaṃ bhikṣum avalokayet
K01vinsutru:4197: / na haiva vayam āyusmann ity arthaṃ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipattitāḥ kaccid āyusman* vastu
K01vinsutru:4198: sthāpayen na putgalam ity api tu śīlaviśuddhyarthaṃ poṣadha ukto bhagavatā dharmathiśuddhyarthaṃ
K01vinsutru:4200: Vin_4.37 / putgagalaṃ sthāpayen na na vastv iti vastu sthāpayet* putgalañ ceti
K01vinsutru:4201: abhaṅgaḥ pratīṣṭaiḥ vyapalāpe sthāpanasya pratīṣṭatāyā sthāpitasya vā /
K01vinsutru:4202: Vin_4.38 / naivaṃvidhaṃ kiñcid astītivāde mṛṣātvam atra pūrvasyāsya vā /
K01vinsutru:4203: Vin_4.39 / kalikṛtāñ cet bhikṣūṇām āganam upagatāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ dvitripoṣadhātikrāntiś cet pravārayeyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:4205: Vin_4.41 / vākyasvalpakena pratyutgamya pātracīvarapratiśamanaṃ layanam ālaṃkakūṭāgāroddeśaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4208: nam ity eṣāṃ pralobhanāni prayuñjīran* asaṃpattāv ātmībhāvasya poṣadhaṃ kurvīran* maṇḍalakeṣu /
K01vinsutru:4209: Vin_4.44 / nanu yuṣmākam adya pravāraṇeti bruvāṇā[44a4]nām āgamayatāyuṣmantāgantukā yūyaṃ naivāsikā anenārtheneti prativadeyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:4225: Vin_4.57 / saṃjñapteḥ kṣamanīyasya purastād dāpanam abhijñāna /
K01vinsutru:4235: Vin_5.2 / yathā trayam evam āstīrṇasya paraṃparabhojanam api nirdoṣaṃ gaṇabhojanaman āmantryagrāmapraveśaś cīvaravijñapanañ ca /
K01vinsutru:4262: Vin_5.29 / tasmai dadīta jñapty ādhāvanasyūtirañjaneṣv asau pūrvaṃgamaḥ syāt* /
K01vinsutru:4264: Vin_5.31 / niṣṭhitaṃ saṃpattau dvitrāṇāṃ svayaṃ sūcīpadakānāṃ dānam* /
K01vinsutru:4265: Vin_5.32 / ādānasvayaṃkṛti tad anteṣv āstā[44b4]riṣyāmy āstṛṇomy āstṛtaṃ mayeti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ cittasyotpādanam* /
K01vinsutru:4267: Vin_5.34 / śvo ham āyuṣmantaḥ kaṭhinam āstariṣyāmi yuṣmābhiḥ svakasvakāni cīvarāṇy uddhartavyāniīti sāmagryām ārocanam* /
K01vinsutru:4269: Vin_5.36 / gandhapuṣpārcitaṃ surabhidhūpadhūpita cāṃgeripaṭalakastham ekaṃ trivānekam ādāya vṛddhā[44b5]nte vasthitenāstṛtes sampādanaṃ pratipadiḥ
K01vinsutru:4273: Vin_5.40 / pratibhikṣum agrataḥ sthitvā āstṛtamiti nivedanam /
K01vinsutru:4274: Vin_5.41 / sādhv āstṛtaṃ suṣṭhv āstṛtaṃ yo tra lābhaś cānuśaṃsaś ca so 'smākamitītaraḥ /
K01vinsutru:4277: Vin_5.44 / kālena kāla śoṣayed ātāpayet* sphoṭayet* /
K01vinsutru:4284: Vin_5.51 / dvividha uddhāraḥ svayaṃ vivartīkṛtṛmaś ca /
K01vinsutru:4285: Vin_5.52 / svayam vivṛttiḥ prāpto sīmāntarasya kaṭhinena /
K01vinsutru:4295: Vin_5.62 / traye kariṣyamāṇasyaitat saṃsthānam āśāsamucchede prārabdhanaṣṭau niṣṭhāna iti /
K01vinsutru:4297: Vin_5.64 / na karmaṇo nyaṅ kāram anu[45a2]ttiṣṭheyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:4301: Vin_5.68 / āśruter asminn ananubhūtevan taṃ pratyanuvṛttir anuśaṃse /
K01vinsutru:4304: Vin_5.71 / nānuddhṛte sarveṣāṃ tātkālikaṃ lābhaṃ bhājayet* /
K01vinsutru:4314: Vin_5.79 / kṛte py atretarair eṣām āvāse lābhe rhatvam* /
K01vinsutru:4317: Vin_5.82 / bhavati chandadānavaśāt sahitena karaṇīyasya śiṣṭaiḥ kṛtau kṛtatvam* /
K01vinsutru:4319: Vin_5.84 / tasmād a[45a4]datvā cchandaṃ svapnasamāpatyoḥ saṃniṣaṇṇe syānutthānam āstārasyoddhṛteś ca prāk śruvaṇāt* /
K01vinsutru:4322: Vin_5.87 / yat tad āstṛtya pṛthak sīmakaraṇe cāsya sthānam* /
K01vinsutru:4338: Vin_6.5 / kūsulakasaṃghakṣike ca yat tadvidhe bhikṣuṇī /
K01vinsutru:4343: Vin_6.10 / āsevakānām atra dānaṃ saṃbhavaś cet /
K01vinsutru:4346: Vin_6.13 / tatkṣaṇād evāśucimrakṣaṇaṃ sampattau śayanāsanaṃ śocayeta /
K01vinsutru:4347: Vin_6.14 / nainaṃ sāṃghikam akhaṭamaṃcapīṭhamapratyāstṛtamatenāniṣādāt saṃvaraṇaṃ vā dattāntarddhānam upabhuñjīta /
K01vinsutru:4348: Vin_6.15 / sarvañ ca citram abhūyo vinaṣṭaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4350: Vin_6.17 / dhāraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇasya yena ekapuṭaṃ nyāyyam /
K01vinsutru:4358: Vin_6.25 / kalpate kośeyamūrṇakaṃ śānakaṃ [45b3] kṣaumakañ ca /
K01vinsutru:4367: Vin_6.34 / pañcānāṃ labheḥ bhājane karaṇam adyalābho bhājayiṣyate tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sannipatitavyam ity ārocanaṃ saṃghe /
K01vinsutru:4386: Vin_6.54 / naikatvam arddhasya suvarutā ca labdher anarhapraveśe kāraṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4388: Vin_6.56 / uṣitatvaṃ bahutaram uṣitasya tatkālake lābhe hānāyāsyāvṛttau mṛtyau ca /
K01vinsutru:4398: Vin_6.66 / asannidhau vā nivṛtte nimittāc cetasi /
K01vinsutru:4402: Vin_6.70 / na jñaptyādhiṣṭhite prāptasya pūrvacarameṇa vā /
K01vinsutru:4403: Vin_6.71 / kasyacit tataḥ saṃghavṛddhanavakayoḥ dānaṃ tad ākhyaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4406: Vin_6.74 / sīmāntarikāt sthalagne kāye nyatra vā yātāmā[46a3]krāntis tāvad gatānāṃ /
K01vinsutru:4415: Vin_6.83 / antargṛhasthatve pātracīvarasya yasmai gṛhapatinā dānaṃ tasyaiśitvam /
K01vinsutru:4424: Vin_6.92 / yat tena sā[46a5]rddham avasthitaṃ tasya deyatvaṃ grāhyatā vā na tasyaiva /
K01vinsutru:4426: Vin_6.94 / ratnā dīpitvaṃ saṃbhāvane yāvadbhya etat tāvatsu nāvakarmikasya viniyogaḥ samaṃ sa glānopasthāyakrātvatadgāmitvaṃ pariskāraṣaṭkasya nādhiṣṭheyatvam /
K01vinsutru:4429: Vin_6.97 / prakrāntatāyāṃ glānasya mṛtyau [46a6] tādarthye deyatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4433: Vin_6.101 / hāyate glānasyoktoktena dāne yathoktena dāne yathoktaṃ kāryatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4436: Vin_6.104 / niryātya gṛhiṇi mṛte putradārasya yathāsukhakaraṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4440: Vin_6.108 / sa cced anyad etat tadaṃśatvenārthiriktatve pi na ced evam eva buddhe muktānāṃ /
K01vinsutru:4450: Vin_6.118 / yathārham anyasya sāṃghikasya nikṣepabhājanaṃ bhojanāni kṣetragṛhāpaṇaśayanāsanāyapaskāralohanāpitakulālatakṣā
K01vinsutru:4467: Vin_6.131 / caturasrakaṃ kṛtabandhārthaṃ sūtrakāvakāśārthaṃ chidraṃ tadākhyam(a) /
K01vinsutru:4473: Vin_6.137 / na kamanamṛṣṭena citropacitreṇa vā daṇḍena /
K01vinsutru:4484: Vin_6.148 / [46b6] dhārayed asyāgṛhakaṃ nāḍikaṃ muṣṭikaṃ vā /
K01vinsutru:4487: Vin_6.151 / pāśakasyānapagamāya cīvare dānaṃ valakaṃ dattvā /
K01vinsutru:4489: Vin_6.153 / na rajakena raktam araktaṃ vā vastraṃ śocayet /
K01vinsutru:4508: Vin_6.172 / tasmād apanīya kuṇḍālake tanmātramollakasya dānaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4515: Vin_6.179 / anekapārśvakatāpair aṅgasya saṃparivarttanaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4516: Vin_6.180 / navaraṅgasya naveṣv eva sādhu dānam /
K01vinsutru:4522: Vin_6.186 / na medhyāṃ caṃkrame vā raṅgakarma kuryuḥ /
K01vinsutru:4528: Vin_6.192 / prastute ced vātavarṣāgamaḥ karaṇaṃ prāsāde /
K01vinsutru:4529: Vin_6.193 / praliptes tatra pradeśe kṛte karaṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4534: / avaśyāya pariśudhe śakyataratvaṃ hastam ardhena bhagasya /
K01vinsutru:4541: Vin_6.197 / na guruṇā sati parākrame bhāreṇākramet /
K01vinsutru:4548: Vin_6.204 / nānayaine kasya kasya cin niyuñjīt* /
K01vinsutru:4551: Vin_6.207 / tadabhūtyai tatra pradeśe vastrasyāsyāṃ dānaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4554: Vin_6.210 / kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ rañjanañ ca /
K01vinsutru:4559: Vin_6.215 / lagnasya kaṣāyodakena kṣodamiśreṇa gate ma[47b2]yitvā mandamandam apanayanaṃ pūyaśoṇitasya ca /
K01vinsutru:4560: Vin_6.216 / kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ rañjanañ ca /
K01vinsutru:4562: Vin_6.218 / na yatra kvacana cīvarāṇi sthāpayet /
K01vinsutru:4567: Vin_6.223 / nidarśanam vihāre parigaṇe py etat /
K01vinsutru:4579: Vin_6.235 / dharmyayā vā kathayādhvani gacched āryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
K01vinsutru:4582: Vin_6.238 / yasya tad pānīyaṃ tam uddiśya /
K01vinsutru:4586: Vin_6.242 / tatpramāṇamadhyardhaṃ śatam upādāya hastānām āśatāt /
K01vinsutru:4588: Vin_6.244 / na vinaitayā durlabhākūpapānīye deśe cāgārikāṃ caret /
K01vinsutru:4589: Vin_6.245 / prasphoṭitacīvaro dhvagaḥ [47b5] snātavāṃ prakṣālitapāṇipādo vā gṛhītapānīyaḥ poccito pānakes tricīvaraṃ prāvṛtya śānteryāpatho vihāraṃ praviśet /
K01vinsutru:4592: Vin_6.248 / prāsādikaḥ susaṃvṛter yaḥ saprabhavenāsya pratiśāmanam /
K01vinsutru:4594: Vin_6.250 / pidhvīyatāṃ dvāraṃ na deyaṃ mṛgayate nivāryo gṛhṇāna iti pratyā[47b6]yitasya
K01vinsutru:4595: pratīcchyāvyupekṣitavatopahṛtau viśvāsavastutāñ copanītena mamaivāyaṃ sahāya ityādi
K01vinsutru:4600: Vin_6.254 / nāśane yācitasyāśucinā 'saṃpatto śocādinā cittagrahaṇasya mūlyadānaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4610: Vin_6.264 / niḥśrayagrahaṇe sa ced enan niyuñjīta /
K01vinsutru:4611: Vin_6.265 / vṛddhaś cet śayanāsanasyāsya dāne tadvārikam /
K01vinsutru:4613: Vin_6.267 / pariṣaṇḍādānam antasya cīvare dhvasto pratividhānaṃ ārāpadakais tatsaṃgrahaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4614: Vin_6.268 / parivāsyābhyavakāśe vṛkṣādy upari saptāṣṭānyahāni pañcāṣātīty aparaṃ śocayitvā śavacīvaraṃ bhuñjīt* /
K01vinsutru:4615: Vin_6.269 / pravedite smaśaniko ham ity upanimantritaḥ praveśaṃ vihārakulayoḥ paribhogañ cānutsṛṣṭasvīkārasya śmaśaniko bhajet* /
K01vinsutru:4619: Vin_6.273 / ūrṇāṃ saṇaṃ karpāsaṃ natukaṃ patramañjarīñ ca /
K01vinsutru:4639: Vin_6.293 / mo[48a5]canaṃ cedyā[..]d asyauṣṭaṃ tāvato niṣkrayatvam /
K01vinsutru:4641: Vin_6.295 / vṛkṣe niryātitasyālaṅkāraś cet tasyaivotsave laṃkaraṇopasthāpanam /
K01vinsutru:4643: Vin_6.297 / na cet stambhe ca navakarmaṇe /
K01vinsutru:4658: Vin_6.312 / cakrasya darśanārthaṃ karaṇaṃ gharmavātavarṣopadraveṇāspṛṣṭyai kūpagārasya dvāravanta /
K01vinsutru:4662: Vin_6.316 / nānuddiśya dvayaṃ śāstṛpūjāyāṃ datte bhikṣuṇīnāṃ sāṃghike praveśaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4663: Vin_6.317 / pṛthagāsāmatre kasyāṃ cakro śrūyaṇe sthūlātyayaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4668: Vin_6.322 / tasyaivātra sannipātagatam anuṣṭheyaṃ saṃghasthavireṇa mūlyasya karaṇam /
K01vinsutru:4671: Vin_6.325 / niścitya punar abhūtiṃ* varddhanasya pātanam /
K01vinsutru:4677: Vin_6.331 / [48b3] datte kasyacid avibhakte vaṅgān mṛtau tadvargyagāmitvaṃ tadaṃśasya /
K01vinsutru:4678: Vin_6.332 / arhati nirvāṇāśayena pravrajitaḥ śīlavāṃ śatasāhasraṃ vastraṃ śatarasaṃbhojanaṃ pañcasūtaṃ kūṭāgāram /
K01vinsutru:4689: Vin_6.343 / maṃcasya ratnamayāde[48b5]r ayomayāt tasya parivartyā /
K01vinsutru:4690: Vin_6.344 / na kāṣṭhamayasya raṃgasya paṃcakād anyasya /
K01vinsutru:4697: Vin_6.351 / yogaṃ bhaktā chādanena pitror udvahet /
K01vinsutru:4698: Vin_6.352 / na cel lābhasya pātracīvarād atirekass amā[48b6]dāpya /
K01vinsutru:4707: Vin_6.359 / nāsāṃghāṭyāṃ chinnādhiṣṭhānaniyamaḥ nāsatve tadrūpāṇāṃ pratyayānām icchanna[49a1] / /
K01vinsutru:4716: Vin_6.367 / anyeṣāñ ca laghūnāṃ paṭapravārāṇāṃ nikaṭaromaprabhṛtīnāṃ /
K01vinsutru:4718: Vin_6.369 / na lomasya viheṭhe syānyathā prāvṛtiṃ bhajet* /
K01vinsutru:4722: Vin_6.373 / na nityam ekayaiva dhārayā caṃkramaṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4725: Vin_6.376 / aśakyatve gomayamradā tatraiva caṃ[49a3]krame lepanaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4729: Vin_6.380 / nāsya śaiklye sadaśāpāśātāyāṃ vā doṣaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4731: Vin_6.382 / adhiṣṭhāya tattvenānujñātā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ dhārayed uparāṃ vikalpānekam api /
K01vinsutru:4745: Vin_6.396 / gandhaiḥ parliguddhasya vāsasaḥ śocayitvā paribhogaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4750: Vin_6.401 / samyaktvaṃ saṃkhyam anuktau sāhyasya vyayacāyanikṣeptre dānam
K01vinsutru:4755: Vin_6.405 / grahaṇaṃ punar labdhau staupikasya vṛtter mū[49a6]laphalekṣubhyo nyasya bhaktārthasyoddeśopajīvyasya vā bhājyatvaṃ svīkārāya /
K01vinsutru:4766: Vin_6.416 / nānavachinnaṃ bhojanam anulābhe bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhuktavatve tatrāpraveśaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4768: Vin_6.418 / āsanasya vṛddhānte bhikṣuṇībhiḥ sanniṣāde muktiḥ /
K01vinsutru:4769: Vin_6.419 / karaṇaṃ sabhikṣutāyām aśaktau teṣāṃ bhikṣuṇyā dakṣiṇādeśa[49b2]nasya sāmānyañ cārayiṣyatīti cārakam āhārasya pratyupasthitapādau dānāya saṃghasthaviro niyuñjīt /
K01vinsutru:4770: Vin_6.420 / yathāsaṃbhāvanam ity avalokya parṣadaṃ prabhūtyelpatve bhaktasya tadākhyānapūrvakaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4772: Vin_6.422 / na cānudghoṣite saṃprāptam iti vṛddhānta ādau gṛhṇīt /
K01vinsutru:4776: Vin_6.426 / pratidādyata ity ato nyena manasā saṃghaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt /
K01vinsutru:4784: Vin_7.2 / pūrveṇa puṇḍakaccho nāma dāvaḥ purataḥ puṇḍavardhanasya /
K01vinsutru:4793: Vin_7.11 / sapta padāny antato gṛhiṇā paribhukte bahupuṭau api /
K01vinsutru:4807: Vin_7.26 / piṇḍībhavajjane ca janapade kholāṃ pūlāṃ ca /
K01vinsutru:4808: Vin_7.27 / na mānyasya sannidhāv upānatpravṛttim bhajeta /
K01vinsutru:4809: Vin_7.28 / na siṃ*havyāghradvīpihastyājāneyāṅgasya kiñcit kāye vasthitatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:4810: Vin_7.29 / kakṣahastikhaṭuṃkāś ca tadanyacaṇḍamṛgān<<ṇ>>ām apy ebhir ākṣepaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4812: Vin_7.31 / udāa rdreṇa natukenaināṃ virajībhāvāya [50a1] / / pocchayet* /
K01vinsutru:4818: Vin_7.37 / na kāṣṭhapādukāyārohed anyatrāntargṛhad aśucikuṭeś ca /
K01vinsutru:4823: Vin_7.42 / atrāpy atra tadrūpeṣv api pratyayeṣv ani[50a2]pattavyatā pratigṛhṇīt tarkṣacarma cakṣuṣe /
K01vinsutru:4827: Vin_7.46 / vāte niṣadyā nipadyā ca sarvam arśaḥsvetad ity asyopayogaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4833: Vin_7.52 / [50a3] snāyvasthidantamāṃsavaṃsānām api tasyākalpikatvaṃ* yasya carmaṇaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4837: Vin_7.56 / na nābhijñāstaraṇe kṛtvā savidhānam agādhamambho vagāhet* /
K01vinsutru:4849: Vin_8.5 / tadvac chuktaśulukadadhimaṇḍodaśvinmaṇḍakāni dakabhinnāni paṭṭapariśrutāni svacchāni mukhadarśīni śarakāṇḍavarṇāni /
K01vinsutru:4850: Vin_8.6 / ayuktiḥ prāg evaṃ [pa]ścād upasaṃpannena yarśanasya sa[50a5]mānavyaṃjanena /
K01vinsutru:4857: Vin_8.13 / atattvāt taddravyasya kālikaṃ ced anupasaṃpannena marddhanaṃ pariśrāvaṇañ ca paṭena /
K01vinsutru:4862: Vin_8.18 / tadasadatiriktakālāśritāvarūḍhiprāpte tasyāṃ cāgamyatvād bhaviṣyataḥ prākṛtānām anadhiṣṭheyatāpatteḥ /
K01vinsutru:4872: Vin_8.28 / svasthatāyām āsāṃ glānyānimittaṃ pācate dānam /
K01vinsutru:4876: Vin_8.32 / candanaṃ cavikā padmakaṃ guḍūci devadāru haridrārdrakam /
K01vinsutru:4887: Vin_8.43 / tadyathā saindhavaṃ sauvarcalaṃ viṭaṃ sāmudraṃ romakam /
K01vinsutru:4890: Vin_8.46 / yāvad āptaṃ dānaṃ snātvā punarasaṃ sparṣaṃ sakṛt snānam iti kaṣāyadānam /
K01vinsutru:4893: Vin_8.49 / tadākhyaṃ punar uccāraprasrāvau stanyayānayāyināṃ vatsakānāṃ viṣe tāv upakārau /
K01vinsutru:4902: Vin_8.58 / jarakucoccārayavāścedakālopayojyatāyāṃ yācakṛtabhaiṣajyasya tadarthaṃ sphareyuḥ nānyāt paribhuñjīt /
K01vinsutru:4906: Vin_8.62 / sānye pi sadbhāvas tadadyācārasya tasmād pūrvakalpena tatsāhye pravṛttiḥ /
K01vinsutru:4907: Vin_8.63 / [50b6] nānāpannasya rūpāntaram apūrvarūpatvaṃ tasmān na visaṃpaccitasya parataḥ svakalpenākalpanam /
K01vinsutru:4908: Vin_8.64 / sampadyate prakṣālanena śaktataṇḍuleṣu pravṛttāvasthānasya svamātrasaṃkhyatā guḍasya /
K01vinsutru:4928: Vin_8.84 / svasaṃbhavatāṃ tatra bhārīkṛtya sūtaṃ vā nidhānam /
K01vinsutru:4929: Vin_8.85 / śoṣaṇataḥ kālena kālaṃ nihitasya pautyānupagatiḥ /
K01vinsutru:4932: Vin_8.88 / [51a3] anayaneta svayam upayātre vināśahetor abhāve nusaṃpannasya /
K01vinsutru:4947: Vin_8.103 / kalpikasya pūrvaṃ tāpanaṃ paścāt paribhogikasya /
K01vinsutru:4950: Vin_8.106 / maṇer loha[51a5]sya vātra nāḍīkasādhvī nāyasaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4957: Vin_8.113 / na rātrir abhyavahāre vicikitsāyām apratirūpā /
K01vinsutru:4959: Vin_8.115 / pānaṃ vicikitsāyai dhūpavartteḥ [51a6] netrikayāsya sampattiḥ /
K01vinsutru:4961: Vin_8.117 / dvādaśāṅgulā sādhvī na tīkṣṇā puruṣā vā /
K01vinsutru:4962: Vin_8.118 / sthavikāyāṃ nidhānaṃ mrakṣayitvā sarpiṣā tailena vā /
K01vinsutru:4963: Vin_8.119 / nāgadantake cīvaravaṃśe vā tasyā sthāpanam /
K01vinsutru:4973: Vin_8.129 / apetatāyāṃ paligodhasya sthitatve ca manojñasya purataḥ khādyabhojyasya mokṣaḥ /
K01vinsutru:4990: Vin_8.145 / prakṣiptabharjitayavasyāsya bhūmau nihitasya sukte tvopagatiḥ /
K01vinsutru:4997: Vin_8.152 / rakṣyas saṃsargas tasmād ūne vigatavegatāyāñ ca /
K01vinsutru:4999: Vin_8.154 / prāsādikañ ca sādhu tasmāc chuklanatrakena sūtīkaraṇam /
K01vinsutru:5002: Vin_8.157 / cikitsārthatāṃ muktve[51b5]ty aprakṛtisāvadye sarvatra śeṣaḥ /
K01vinsutru:5003: Vin_8.158 / na laśunaṃ palāṇḍuṃ gṛñjanakaṃ vā paribhuñjīta /
K01vinsutru:5005: Vin_8.160 / nopayuñjanaḥ parataś ca saptāhaṃ laśune palāṇḍau trirātram ekarātraṃ gṛñjanavihāraṃ paribhuñjīt /
K01vinsutru:5038: Vin_8.191 / nānye kasyaikasya yānāyāvihārasya kṛtyakaraṇam aprāsādikam /
K01vinsutru:5050: Vin_8.203 / tadyathā drākṣyadāḍimakharjūrākṣoṣṭau vātāma urumānarāmāpikākurumāyikānikocobabhūḥ piñcitikā[52a4]puṣkarañ ca tadākhyam /
K01vinsutru:5054: Vin_8.205 / na rājyam upārdham vāsya pratīccheta /
K01vinsutru:5063: Vin_8.214 / nāprajñāyamānāya vyayo bhayānyatare gaṇanāṃ mṛgayet /
K01vinsutru:5067: Vin_8.217 / yato nāgatiḥ śabdasya vihāre tatra kalpakāram āpanam /
K01vinsutru:5068: Vin_8.218 / deyatvaṃ bhaktasya karaṇaṃ ceta karmaṇaḥ /
K01vinsutru:5071: Vin_8.221 / nābhyām anupānapaṭṭakāc cānyat kaṃsabhājanaṃ pudgalo dhārayet /
K01vinsutru:5073: Vin_8.223 / grahaṇaṃ rakṣāyai pratipādyamānānām apy anyānāṃ samānavyañjanānām /
K01vinsutru:5086: Vin_8.236 / nāpārśvanihitatāṃ prāgāvāt pātra[52b2]sya piṇḍāya pravṛttau bhajet /
K01vinsutru:5095: Vin_8.245 / [52b3] śocanam asaṃbhave jalasya dadhyādimaṇḍena pādayoḥ /
K01vinsutru:5103: Vin_8.253 / adhiṣṭhāpakānām apahartṛtve vā karaṇam uddeśaḥ /
K01vinsutru:5105: Vin_8.255 / yathā vṛddhikayā [52b4] niṣādanāya dāpanāya ca mahāsannipāte bhikṣūṇām uddeśaḥ /
K01vinsutru:5106: Vin_8.256 / niṣadeyuḥ dvitrāvarjāṃ yatheṣṭam atra bhikṣuṇyāḥ /
K01vinsutru:5119: Vin_8.269 / na yena mantrita tato 'nyasya labdheḥ svīkāre 'sty ayuktatvam /
K01vinsutru:5121: Vin_8.271 / tad antargatavad anyopanimantraṇe niṣaṇṇasyānujñātaṃ tenānyadattam /
K01vinsutru:5123: Vin_8.273 / nāntaṃ visarjayet [52b6] dṛṣṭiśīlasampannābhyāmāntasyānyatra yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dānam atiriktasya cālopād yātrākāriṇo grahaṇam /
K01vinsutru:5125: Vin_8.275 / māt[ā]pitṛglānaputrahyāpekṣakukṣīmatībhyo vineyākāṃ kṣāpiṇḍapātaṃ spṛṣṭavate gṛhiṇe ca saṃprāptāya saṃvibhāgaś ca tatḥ karaṇam /
K01vinsutru:5130: Vin_8.280 / na nimantraṇake śraddhadeyatvena pātrādhiṣṭhāne 'syocchiṣṭāśilāṃ yathā sukhakaraṇam /
K01vinsutru:5145: Vin_8.294 / nāpareṇa sārddham ekatra bhājane bhuñjīt* /
K01vinsutru:5148: Vin_8.297 / śrāmaṇere ca sārddhaṃ paravadayoge kalpakārakānāṃ piṇḍīkṛtya dānam /
K01vinsutru:5158: Vin_8.307 / nedamito vā dehīti bhojanārtham upaviṣṭapariveṣṭāraṃ bodhayet /
K01vinsutru:5160: Vin_8.309 / tadyathā mandāgnau pakvasyāmasya dīpatāgnau glānasaṃjñām /
K01vinsutru:5180: Vin_8.329 / akṛte ced gamanapratyayaḥ parivāradānaṃ bhikṣūṇām /
K01vinsutru:5184: Vin_8.333 / nigileṣva [53b1]nāḍikokāloṅgarān dvitrānādau chorayitvā mukhaṃ nirmādya /
K01vinsutru:5186: Vin_8.335 / tasmān mukham akāle pravāritaś codgārārāme nirmādayed anyaḥ /
K01vinsutru:5189: Vin_8.338 / naitat chandaṃ vā sthāvirasya purataṣkuryāt /
K01vinsutru:5198: Vin_8.348 / adurgandhībhāvaprāṇakāsaṃbhavāya kālena kālaṃ śocanaṃ śoṣaṇañ ca /
K01vinsutru:5222: Vin_8.372 / na tatpratibaddhakāryād anyena tatsamīpe tiṣṭhet /
K01vinsutru:5236: Vin_8.386 / sāmantake duḥkhanaṃ cet pātravaibhaṅgukānāṃ dānam* /
K01vinsutru:5254: Vin_8.403 / nirdoṣaṃ śūte kukṣeḥ prāgantāt poccanamātraṃ kṛtvāsanaṃ nāto nyaḥ /
K01vinsutru:5287: Vin_9.28 / kalpikam aśaktau karmakārikāyānitīritaṃ tayā bhikṣuṇā kṛtam vacanam* /
K01vinsutru:5288: Vin_9.29 / yasmāt tūṣṇīm ity ataḥ prāk* /
K01vinsutru:5290: Vin_9.31 / na yasya kriyateḥ [54a5] tasmād asatvaṃ pūrakatvasya chandapariśuddhir vidheḥ /
K01vinsutru:5304: Vin_9.45 / vartamānasya nāto nyaibhiḥ saśrutaṃ kuryuḥ /
K01vinsutru:5312: Vin_9.53 / tatsīmāntargatasyārhasya pūraṇe kāyataḥ chandato vā saṃniṣāde nanupraviṣṭatvaṃ
K01vinsutru:5313: pratikroṣantā ca yasya tatkarma tato nyasya pratikūlaṃ cet dharmaṃ vācyutasyeryāpathāt*
K01vinsutru:5317: Vin_9.56 / aprakṛtisthatvam atra cānyatra vā karaṇīye karaṇīyakṛtau ca /
K01vinsutru:5324: Vin_9.64 / na niyamya kālaṃ paunaḥpunye nyatra vā /
K01vinsutru:5325: Vin_9.65 / dadhyur anyatra yāvad arthaṃ parihāraṃ /
K01vinsutru:5327: Vin_9.67 / yasya pūraṇe narhatva śalākācāraṇe pi tasya /
K01vinsutru:5328: Vin_9.68 / saṃghabhede sya rūḍhir anarhe na cāraṇe śalākāṇāṃ /
K01vinsutru:5336: Vin_9.74 / punaś cet taccikīrṣādhikopanam vā ca /
K01vinsutru:5338: Vin_9.76 / punar bhadantājñaptiṃ* kariṣyāmy anuśrāvaṇañ ceti /
K01vinsutru:5342: Vin_9.79 / niṣaṇṇo syotkuṭukikayā purato nirikteś ca /
K01vinsutru:5345: Vin_9.82 / masūrikādau striyāḥ [54b6] vṛddhānte nanyatantratāyāṃ saṃghe sthitasya parārthe sapraṇatam* /
K01vinsutru:5350: Vin_9.87 / pātrabhaiṣajyaṃ vāme pāṇo pratisthāpya pratichādya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā /
K01vinsutru:5355: Vin_9.90 / rohanty asānnidhye cīvarasya manasā vikalpa utsarge dhiṣṭhānañ ca nānutsṛṣṭe pūrvatra /
K01vinsutru:5362: Vin_9.97 / ādau [55a2] ca triḥpragṛhītāṃ jalitvaṃ tādarthye divasārocane ca /
K01vinsutru:5363: Vin_9.98 / aupayikam ity ante svārthaṃ vijñaptena vacanaṃ pudgalaś cet /
K01vinsutru:5365: Vin_9.100 / chandadveṣamohabhayagativirahitasya śaktasya kṛtākṛtasmaraṇe saṃmatir utsāhya /
K01vinsutru:5379: Vin_10.3 / na sīmāntarasthasya kasmiṃś cid aṅgatvam /
K01vinsutru:5381: Vin_10.5 / ubhayasthatvam ekasminn e[55a4]katra pāde parasmin paratra /
K01vinsutru:5395: Vin_10.19 / na hāsyabhāvena kasyacit sthūlam arūḍhibuddhyā bhedotkṣepayoḥ /
K01vinsutru:5397: Vin_10.21 / nānyeṣāṃ nānāsaṃvāsikebhyo barhāṇāṃ pūraṇe gaṇena jñaptivācanayoḥ /
K01vinsutru:5399: Vin_10.23 / saṃpannatvaṃ [55a6] jñaptiśrutāv asya nāvidhir bhavyarūpe pratinidhinā dūtena pravrājanam /
K01vinsutru:5410: Vin_10.33 / na bhikṣubhikṣuṇītvayor anyakarmavastupratijñapite codakena kalpayati sāṃmukhyaṃ praṇidhikaraṇam /
K01vinsutru:5412: Vin_10.35 / anaṅgam adarśane vyāghātitvāt sattvasya pratijñānam /
K01vinsutru:5418: ca bhikṣuśikṣāyām utkacaprakacasya saṃghe roma pātayato niḥsaraṇaṃ pravarttayataḥ
K01vinsutru:5419: samīcīm upadarśayato viramato nimittād avasāraṇaṃ yācite /
K01vinsutru:5427: Vin_10.48 / tatkṣama[55b4]ṇakam atra karmaṇaḥ sthāne 'vasāraṇaṃ prati pratītāyām[ā]pattāvapratikṛtāyām
K01vinsutru:5428: apratikāryāyāṃ saṃvareṇādṛṣṭim udbhāvayantam anicchantaṃ pratikṛtim anuṣṭhātum anutsṛjantaṃ
K01vinsutru:5430: Vin_10.49 / ihaivainām āpattiṃ pratikurvīthā ayam eva tv āsaṃghaḥ prasrambhayiṣyati ity evaṃ brūyyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:5441: Vin_10.60 / sannihite tatrāsrame pratideśanīyasya garhyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyanta dharmaṃ pratide[śa]yāmi iti /
K01vinsutru:5466: Vin_10.85 / kriyamāntāyām anayos tatsaṃghāvaśeṣāpadane dhvaṃsaḥ kṛtādānayoḥ /
K01vinsutru:5469: Vin_10.88 / tasmād arūḍhasyāsya pṛthak tadānīm utthāpyatā prathamaṃ ca /
K01vinsutru:5485: Vin_10.102 / nāsāṃ manye praṇidhātṝṇām avasāraṇasya praṇihitau rūḍhiḥ /
K01vinsutru:5493: Vin_10.110 / vikṛteḥ kriyamāṇapraṇidhinā dhvaste[56a5]na ca niṣkāsya mānena bhajane bhāṇḍasya choraṇam /
K01vinsutru:5501: Vin_10.118 / anivṛttau kaler upaśāntyai prayatnād utkṣepaḥ /
K01vinsutru:5507: Vin_10.124 / udbhavo 'nyasya praṇidhiḥ nimitte tadarthābhisandhināny aprakṛtau /
K01vinsutru:5515: Vin_10.132 / pātrasasvākhyātāraṃ prati bhikṣor abhūtena pārājaikena /
K01vinsutru:5519: Vin_10.136 / na nikubjitayā tasya [56b2] gṛhān gacchet /
K01vinsutru:5524: Vin_10.141 / yat karma karaṇaṃ tadgatānāṃ nikubjitatvam /
K01vinsutru:5533: Vin_10.150 / śuddhir ekasya purato deśanena saṃghāvaśeṣato hrīmataḥ /
K01vinsutru:5543: kṛtaṃ ne vā kiṃ* vā kīdṛśyaṃ ceti smartum anupasaṃpa katotkṣiptayoś cānutthānaṃ pratichādasya /
K01vinsutru:5555: Vin_11.13 / śodhite vastuni sāṣānuṣṭhānam anirjñāne pratichādakālasyāsaṃvya ānany ūnatvasya saṃśrayaṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5560: Vin_11.18 / yāvatīṣv abhiprāyas tāvat kīmitvam atrātrānuṣṭhiteḥ /
K01vinsutru:5561: Vin_11.19 / aparimāna ity anirjñāne sya saṃśrayasaṃbahulāḥ parimānavatya iti prābhūtye /
K01vinsutru:5565: Vin_11.23 / carato paraprāksampannapraticikīrṣotpattau pṛ[tha]g* dānam ekaṃ caraṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5580: Vin_12.2 / yasyābhyāmakaraṇam itarair api tatra tadgatasya /
K01vinsutru:5581: Vin_12.3 / yad aparihāṇikāto nyathānena sārddham acaṃkra[57a3]maṇam /
K01vinsutru:5590: Vin_12.12 / anuddeśaḥ poṣadhe prātimokṣasya saty anyatroddeṣṭari /
K01vinsutru:5599: Vin_12.21 / [57a5] vratasya niḥsāraḥ pravartito bhavatīti manasikaraṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5611: Vin_12.33 / kṛte bhaktakṛtye śayanāsanasya channe gopanam* /
K01vinsutru:5617: Vin_12.39 / na ced anyasya bhikṣor adhyeṣaṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5628: / prāg* dvāramokṣyād vihārādau ca paryuṣitavac caritapattau /
K01vinsutru:5636: / arūḍair aprakṛtistheṣu paripāsamānāpy aśikṣācaraṇānāṃ / [end of R om.]
K01vinsutru:5641: Vin_12.50 / na yatryānye triḥprabhṛtayaḥ sarvathā tadākhyacaraṇās tatra taccaret* /
K01vinsutru:5645: Vin_12.54 / pratyahaṃ na cec ciraṃ caritavyatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5648: Vin_12.57 / [57b4] kalahakārakāgamanañ ca śrutvā bhayañ cedataḥ pratini[ḥ]sṛjetāṃ saṃghasannidhau pudgale vā /
K01vinsutru:5652: Vin_12.59 / chedas tadahorātrasya prakṛtisthena sārdham ekachadane parivāsikamānāsyacāriṇoḥ śayyāyāṃ bahi[ḥ]sīmni ca /
K01vinsutru:5654: Vin_12.61 / nāsannidhau tatsīmni śrāvyāṇām asyotthānaṃ nirdoṣaṃ tadaharā[57b5]gatau sīmāntare gamanam* /
K01vinsutru:5655: Vin_12.62 / na parivāsikena sārdham ekachadane pārivāsikaḥ śayīt* /
K01vinsutru:5656: Vin_12.63 / na tīrthyupanivāsasthasya tena sārdham atra doṣaḥ //
K01vinsutru:5665: Vin_13.7 / āgamaya tvam āyuṣmaṃ glānas tvam aprayojyama ity āyusmaṃ bhūteti glāno sāv ananuyojyā iti prativadeyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:5666: Vin_13.8 / anavagatasvarūpatāyāṃ kṛtasya kartur vā codanasya /
K01vinsutru:5674: Vin_13.16 / savacanīyaṃ tv āyuṣman karomi na tvaṃ yo smādāvāsādanavalokya prakramitavyam asti me āyuṣmati praṇihitaṃ vacanāyeti /
K01vinsutru:5679: Vin_13.21 / karaṇam asyatra sthāpakaiḥ sthāpitasya tena [58a2] sārdham upasāraṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5681: Vin_13.23 / vakṣyāmy atrāmutra vā vase mutra vā vāstuni yatra ceṣṭam ity āropya cāmattiṃ* darśayitvāparādham utsṛjanena /
K01vinsutru:5682: Vin_13.24 / śīladṛṣṭyā cārājīva vipatyā sarvasyāsya codanādeḥ kriyāyāṃ ruḍhiḥ samūlakaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5685: Vin_13.27 / kriyānimittānāṃ parasaṃlāpa[58a3]sya sānuśrāvaṇasyeti trividhaṃ śrutaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5689: Vin_13.31 / nāpoṣadhe tasya na kṛtau kṛtatve vā strītve sthāpakasyai[ka]tarasya puṃstve sthāpitatvaṃ sthāpitatā /
K01vinsutru:5696: Vin_14.1 // na nānātvāya saṃghasya prabhāviṣṇum akā[58a4]maṃ codayed unmoṭayed vā codayatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5697: Vin_14.2 / na yatra prativirodhas tena sārdham abhinamane samāsīta /
K01vinsutru:5700: Vin_14.5 / antaritasyānayor vihārasya deyatvaṃ grāhyatā ca /
K01vinsutru:5701: Vin_14.6 / dharme vinaye caitadvatām adharme ced abhiniveśo jñātvā saṃghasāmagrīn na vidyate /
K01vinsutru:5702: Vin_14.7 / tasmān na tad anyānāṃ saṃbhūya kṛtau karmaṇo rūḍhin na paraspareṇāvyagratvam* /
K01vinsutru:5703: Vin_14.8 / [58a5] kaliparāyaṇatva eṣā tadvipakṣasya cāvandyatvam idaṃ dharmabhiḥ /
K01vinsutru:5708: Vin_14.13 / mṛddhadvā vayam iti vadatsu yūtham api śramaṇāḥ śākyaputriyā sma ity ātmānam* [58a6] pratijānīdhve /
K01vinsutru:5709: Vin_14.14 / yeṣāṃ cedaṃ vṛttam iyaṃ vārtā kāruṇiko vaḥ śāstā yenaitad anujñātam etad api vo na prāpadyata iti prativadeyur anyatra /
K01vinsutru:5712: Vin_14.17 / nāpi sāritāām eṣāṃ sāmagyasya vinā sāmagrīlābhenotthāpanaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5721: Vin_14.24 / karmaṇaḥ kṛtāvadharmavādibhir antaḥsīmni pṛthak tadbhedo tadacittena /
K01vinsutru:5725: Vin_14.28 / sthalasthair atra sanni ced bhikṣuṇīnām acodyatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5736: Vin_14.39 / tat tatā yadīyasyotsaṃghe pratipādanaṃ [58b3] dvayoś ced ubhayatra /
K01vinsutru:5740: Vin_15.1 / jñapanato vā pṛthagbhāvasya dharmāt saṃghabhedaḥ /
K01vinsutru:5742: Vin_15.3 / arūḍhir asyāsaṃghaparimāṇatve bhidyamānānām asatve cānyeṣām antaḥsīmni saṃghaparisānānām adharmadharmayoḥ tathātvena pratyavagatāv ānantaryaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5748: Vin_16.2 / padārthatathātve vipratipattir varjanaṃ sāpattikā sāmagryadānaṃ karmāṇi /
K01vinsutru:5750: Vin_16.4 / anena ca śuddhidāne ca dvitīyanimittasya /
K01vinsutru:5753: Vin_16.7 / sabhyai svayam aśaktau vivaditroḥ saṃpra[58b5]tipādanam* /
K01vinsutru:5771: Vin_16.25 / samantṛtvaṃ vargasya svato saktau vyūḍhakeṣu /
K01vinsutru:5774: Vin_16.28 / tena sasthavire saprātimokṣe nyatra saṃgha upanikṣepaḥ /
K01vinsutru:5780: Vin_16.34 / varjayed asau tataḥ svīkaraṇaṃ kasyacit* /
K01vinsutru:5783: Vin_16.37 / anupadhūta idaṃ vadet teṣāṃ ca [59a2] āyuṣmanta alābhānālābhādurlabho
K01vinsutru:5784: na sulabhā ye yūyaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyā kalahajātā viharata bhaṇḍanajātā
K01vinsutru:5785: vikṛhītā vivādam āpannām āyuṣmantaḥ kalaho mā bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho mā vivādaḥ //
K01vinsutru:5786: nāsti dvayor yudhyato jaya ekasya jaya ekasya parājayaḥ /
K01vinsutru:5787: nāsti dvayor dhāvato jaya ekasya jaya ekasya parājaya [59a3] iti /
K01vinsutru:5788: Vin_16.38 / bahutaramatena saṃsthānam ity aparaḥ saṃpratipādanaprakāraḥ /
K01vinsutru:5791: Vin_16.41 / kharamarthipratyarthikair gṛhītatve pragāḍham* ca vyāḍhatve teṣāṃ bhedāśaṃkitāyām asya saṃsrayaṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5802: Vin_16.50 / tathā ced adharmaśalākādhikyasaṃpattiṃ* [59a5] manyeta na chandānupradānena sāmagrye cārayeta /
K01vinsutru:5803: Vin_16.51 / dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dharmaśalākānāṃ cāraṇakāle grahaṇaṃ vāmenetarāsāṃ /
K01vinsutru:5805: sthavire yaṃ dharmaśalākā ajihmā avaṃkā akuṭil[ā] su[va]rṇā sugandhā sukhasaṃsparśā gṛhāṇeti dvayor vācor itarāṃ mṛgaya tena prayacchet* /
K01vinsutru:5806: Vin_16.53 / yathā dharmodbhavam* [59a6] manyeta tathā cārayec channam vā vṛtaṃ vā /
K01vinsutru:5807: Vin_16.54 / āyusman, upādhyāyena te dharmaśalākā gṛhītā ācāryeṇa samānopādhyāyena
K01vinsutru:5808: samānācāryeṇāla[pta]kena na saṃlaptakena saṃstutakena sapremakena tvam api dharmaśalākaṃ
K01vinsutru:5809: gṛhāṇa mātretaiḥ sārdhaṃ virukṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vā karṇamūle tantunāyaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5812: Vin_16.57 / na bhedodbhavakṣāntyā nādharmyasya na jānannayo bhaviṣyattāṃ /
K01vinsutru:5816: Vin_16.61 / caturdhā taccodanāvastukamanyānuṣṭhānavaśāt pratikṛtyanapekṣaṇād unmattakṛtena ca /
K01vinsutru:5820: Vin_16.65 / nirvikriyasavikriyaś ca dviprakāraḥ prādeśikaḥ sakalasaṃghagataś ca /
K01vinsutru:5825: Vin_16.70 / bahūnām arthe trāsaṃghe deśyānām ekena pratikaraṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5834: Vin_16.79 / viparyayato dharmavinayatadviparyayāṇāṃ saṃghamadhye saṃcintyeti trikānvitaṃ codakam ādṛyeran /
K01vinsutru:5836: Vin_16.81 / saṃjñapanama saṃjñapanamarentaḥ piṭakānāṃ dhārayituran evaṃvidhasya samanuyuñjīrann enaṃ bhāvaḥ pratibodhāya sthānasthāpanena /
K01vinsutru:5839: Vin_16.84 / pratijñānaṃ coditena niṣṭhā dṛṣṭasatyatve prakṛṣṭataratve ca guṇato nyasya catuṣpramāṇīkaraṇaṃ gṛhiṇo pi /
K01vinsutru:5850: Vin_16.95 / pratipato syaitad avajñānam iti ca pratyavagatāvadarśakatvapratītāyājātatvabhāvāt* /
K01vinsutru:5860: Vin_16.103 / prakrāntāv anyena dīrgharogajātasya spṛṣṭau vā /
K01vinsutru:5875: Vin_17.9 / ekasya gandhakuṭer madhye pakṣasya kartavyatā /
K01vinsutru:5881: Vin_17.15 [60a3] anujāniyur anyeṣāṃ sāṃghike vastuni saṃghāya pudgalāya vā bhikṣave vāsavastu(na)karaṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5884: Vin_17.18 / vyavadhyartha bhittikaraṇena svarūpe saṃrāgapratyayaṃ vihanyuḥ /
K01vinsutru:5885: Vin_17.19 / aṃjalipūraṇikayā pāyanena mātṛgrāmam anug[ṛ]hṇīta nācchinnadhārādānena /
K01vinsutru:5886: Vin_17.20 / arhastu kāla[t]v[e] ntarvarṣam ā[60a4]gato lābhe /
K01vinsutru:5891: Vin_17.25 / nirdoṣam atadarthaṃ gatasya velāprāptau vihārāntare bhojanam* /
K01vinsutru:5893: Vin_17.27 / atiriktatāyāṃ bhikṣu mātrarthād grahaṇan na vihāram avyuperan* /
K01vinsutru:5903: Vin_17.37 / darśanamatirukṣaśaraṇapṛṣṭhaṃ mā tvaṃ jvarita iti [60a6] saṃjñayā khyāpanam ity atropāya[ḥ] /
K01vinsutru:5907: Vin_17.41 / utthāyaivāsau kālyam avalokayed vihāram* caityā[ṅ]ganaṃ ca /
K01vinsutru:5908: Vin_17.42 / [..] uccāraś cet tatkṛtaḥ chorayet* prasrāvaś ced u[ddhū]ṣennakharikābhilikhitaṃ cet samaṃ kuryāt* /
K01vinsutru:5914: Vin_17.47 / dhātusāmyaṃ pṛṣṭvā sām[ī]cīkaraṇapūrvakaṃ na[ḥ]kasya grahaṇāyeryapathabhajaṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:5928: Vin_17.61 / susvādhyāyitaṃ suparimṛṣṭaṃ niḥsaṃdhigdhaṃ kṛtvoddeśadhāraṇaṃ ca /
K01vinsutru:5940: Vin_17.69 / cāraṇe syaiṣāṃ vyāpāro bhukte ca gopane /
K01vinsutru:5949: Vin_17.76 / tat prathato bhuktvā vaṃsam ādāya kākacaṭakapāra([ta])
K01vinsutru:5968: Vin_17.91 / dvayaṃ paligodho bhakṣyamāṇena vā dantakāṣṭhād aśucinā vā tadbhūmiparikarmaṇāt* /
K01vinsutru:5969: Vin_17.92 / paligodha tatra nāgnyam ekacīvaratā cadevandane pañcamaṇḍalakena jaṃghaprapī[ḍa]nikayā ca /
K01vinsutru:5970: Vin_17.93 / na kṣut*vantaṃ jīv[e]ty abhivanded utsṛjyāntyāvayasamāgārikāṃ ca /
K01vinsutru:5976: Vin_17.98 / nāsya nirūpāpadaṃ nāma gotram vā gṛhṇīyāt* /
K01vinsutru:5981: Vin_17.102 / gamanāgamanasaṃpannava[stu]ni navakarmiko vihāraṃ prati sthāpayet* /
K01vinsutru:5984: Vin_17.106 / kāraṇam anujñāte dātrāvihārakaraṇārthād vastunas tatkaraṇabhāṇḍasya /
K01vinsutru:5987: Vin_17.109 / bhojanaṃ navakarmakeṇa tādṛśasya yādṛśyaṃ yavane /
K01vinsutru:5993: Vin_17.115 / niravadyam eṣāṃ purojitve bharasya purodveṣṭanam* /
K01vinsutru:5994: Vin_17.116 / prārabdhasya ca vṛhatto lpasya vā karaṇārthaṃ bhañjanam* /
K01vinsutru:5996: Vin_17.118 / sīrṇatānimittaṃ tulyayor api niṣṭhitayoś ca /
K01vinsutru:6003: Vin_17.126 / deyatvam ardhotthite saṃghārthañ ce[d] utthānakasya /
K01vinsutru:6004: Vin_17.127 / paścādbhaktaṃ taddāne kālo hemantaś ce[d] grīṣmaś ceti pūrvabhaktaṃ /
K01vinsutru:6051: Vin_17.171 / grahaṇāya saṃcāraṇe lohakaṇṭakānāṃ catu[61b3]ṣke py eṣu dānam /
K01vinsutru:6055: Vin_17.175 / lambanānāṃ sopānakasya karaṇam iṣṭakāmayasya sthire /
K01vinsutru:6066: Vin_17.185 / mauñje vāvalvajaḥ sāṇakaḥ kārpyāsikā iti /
K01vinsutru:6070: naṃ kledaś ca kāṣṭhasya tasmād ayomayīnāṃ /
K01vinsutru:6074: Vin_17.192 / pānīyena prāsādasyāplavanāya varṣāsu paṭṭānāṃ dānaṃ [sta]mbhāntareṣu /
K01vinsutru:6101: Vin_17.217 / aupapādukānāṃ satvānāṃ ghaṭiyaṃtravaccyavamānānām upapadyamānānāṃ ca rāgadveṣamohānāṃ pārāvatabhujaṃgasūkarākāreṇa /
K01vinsutru:6105: Vin_17.221 / ūrdhaṃ buddhasya śuklaṃ nirvāṇamaṇḍalam upadarśayet* /
K01vinsutru:6106: Vin_17.222 / gāthayo[62a3]r ārabdham iti dvayor adhastāt* /
K01vinsutru:6115: Vin_17.231 / agniśālāyāṃ mecakādi kurvatām agniṃ* ca jvālayatāṃ kumbhāṇḍaputrāṇāṃ /
K01vinsutru:6116: Vin_17.232 / dānapater dīpaṃ dhārayato devadūti yasya ca /
K01vinsutru:6117: Vin_17.233 / nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitānāṃ kalaśa[hastā]nāṃ nāgakanyakānāṃ codakaṃ dhārayantīnāṃ pānīyamaṇḍape /
K01vinsutru:6120: Vin_17.236 / na vihāre nabhyavakāśe sadhūmam agniṃ* kuryād dhārayed dhārakuṭṭime sarvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:6126: Vin_17.242 / avaśiṣṭam aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca sarvasaṃghe [62a6] gaṇḍīm ākoṭṭya dharmyayā vā kathayāryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
K01vinsutru:6127: Vin_17.243 / dharmotsave sekaḥ sukumāryāś ca gomayakārṣāḥ pradānam* /
K01vinsutru:6132: Vin_17.248 / ratnārthaṃ saṃmṛṣṭāmṛṣṭayor gandhakūṭipratimācaityayaṣṭichayānāṃ cāryāṃ gāthāṃ paṭhatā laṃghaṇaṃ /
K01vinsutru:6133: Vin_17.249 / śayanā[62b1]sanasyānayor evāhnoḥ pratyavekṣaṇaṃ saṃskaraṇaṃ niḥsṛtaiḥ /
K01vinsutru:6143: Vin_17.259 / aśakyatāyāṃ cīrīkṛtya yaṣṭyām upanibadhya prasphoṭanam* /
K01vinsutru:6144: Vin_17.260 / tathāpy ayogyatve gomayamṛdāstambhasuśire kuṇyasya vā lepanam* /
K01vinsutru:6146: Vin_17.262 / na dvārakoṣṭhake prāsāde vā śayyāprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā vā dhāraṇaṃ kuryāt* /
K01vinsutru:6147: Vin_17.263 / kuryād aśadrava pratipakṣeṇārtham aṣṭamīcaturdaśai prāsāde /
K01vinsutru:6149: Vin_17.265 / kuṭimāvināśārtham* [[62b3] maṇḍalam adhaḥpādakachedaṃ kāraye[nu]ṣamuṭake cainaṃ sthāpayen natukena vā veṣṭayet* /
K01vinsutru:6160: Vin_17.275 / nāpareṇe sārdham ekatra maṃce saṃ[s]tare nyatra vā /
K01vinsutru:6161: Vin_17.276 / kalpayed asaṃbhave lajjī pṛtha[k] pratyāsthī[tyā]ntare vṛṣikāpātrasthāvikādi dattvā smṛtim upasthāpya /
K01vinsutru:6162: Vin_17.277 / na trayād ūrdhaṃ pracitiḥ sāhyena maṃcarūḍhatāṃ bhajet* /
K01vinsutru:6165: Vin_17.280 / na trivarṣāḥ pareṇāntaritena sārdham āsanasya /
K01vinsutru:6166: Vin_17.281 / bhaje[d] āntargṛhe [62b5] upādhyāyenāpy āsanābhāve smṛtim upasthāpya /
K01vinsutru:6173: Vin_17.287 / saṃcāraṇe śayanāsanasya dvau ced ekena maṃcapīṭhasya vā grahaṇam apareṇa vṛśyādeḥ /
K01vinsutru:6174: Vin_17.288 / naita[tsā]ṃghikamadayam ākarṣenniṣkarṣed dhīna tathā kuryād yathāsya
K01vinsutru:6178: Vin_17.291 / ātapanaṃ sye śoṣaṇaṃ prasphoṭanaṃ chidrer gaḍakadānam* /
K01vinsutru:6182: Vin_17.295 / aśakyapratisaṃskaraṇatāyāṃ dīpeṣu viniyogo vartikātvena ratnopayogeṣu pudgaladātṛkeṣv api /
K01vinsutru:6183: Vin_17.296 / anupayajyamānasyātra kardamena bhittistambhakavāṭasuṣireṣu ratneṣu lepanam ity anupratipattiḥ /
K01vinsutru:6186: Vin_17.299 / na śa[63a2]kyaṃ sāṃghikam apaharantaṃ dṛṣ[ṭra] na nivārayet* /
K01vinsutru:6190: Vin_17.303 / paribhuktir asaṃbhave svasthānopanayanasya sthānāntare paribhogena /
K01vinsutru:6191: Vin_17.304 / na sthānāntarīyaṃ bhaktopakaraṇalābhaṃ sthānāntare paribhuñjīt* /
K01vinsutru:6195: Vin_17.308 / nirava[d]yoṃsibhiḥ [63a3] sāṃghikasya svasyaiva nirupayojyasya tṛṇakāṣṭhasyopayogaḥ /
K01vinsutru:6205: Vin_17.318 / na saty arthini kṛtakṛtya āvṛddhi bhojyam* dhāray[e]t* /
K01vinsutru:6208: Vin_17.321 / nārthisadbhāve satyāṃ gatau sāṃghikasya paliguddhatāṃ bhajet* /
K01vinsutru:6210: Vin_17.323 / dhārayet saṃgho niṣadāṃ putrakaṃ cā[63a5]syāḥ /
K01vinsutru:6211: Vin_17.324 / nāpitabhāṇḍañ ca suktyāṃ prakṣipya bhitto sthāpanam* /
K01vinsutru:6212: Vin_17.325 / vāsī ca saparaśunakhādanādi ta[d] bhāṇḍam* /
K01vinsutru:6224: Vin_17.337 / saṃbhavaty anayor ekena vacasā dānam* /
K01vinsutru:6268: Vin_17.382 / kṛtatām atra saṃvidhānasya upadhivārikaṃ saṃghasthaviraḥ pṛcchet* /
K01vinsutru:6269: Vin_17.383 / vihāramoṣe na ced baddhatvaṃ samāyuktair upadhivārikasya dāsya /
K01vinsutru:6272: Vin_17.386 / nābaddhvā yāvad bhāvaṃ bandhanaiḥ dvāraṃ prakrāmeta /
K01vinsutru:6273: Vin_17.387 / śūnyāvāsaṃ cet praviśe sekādy anukuryāt* /
K01vinsutru:6274: Vin_17.388 / bhāṇḍaṃ viprakṛtaṃ pratiśamayet* [63b6]nirmṛjya da[kṣa]maṃ cet* /
K01vinsutru:6276: Vin_17.390 / gṛhiṇaś ced atrāgaccheyur dharmyam ebhyaṣkathām anyac ca
K01vinsutru:6291: Vin_17.403 / gṛṣme syāś cedārtham apanayaḥ pūrvasyāpi varṣāḥ svakledāntam* /
K01vinsutru:6295: Vin_17.407 / kvacid dantakā[64a2]ṣṭhabhakṣyaṇam* kvacin mukhaśocanaṃ kvacit* pādayor ity evaṃ na tatprasṛtatayā /
K01vinsutru:6299: Vin_17.411 / pṛthag pravṛttyāpi pāṭhako bahutaropasthāpanakāriṇām aśakta sānukampet* /
K01vinsutru:6303: Vin_17.414 / [64a3] asamarthaś ca smartuṃ dhāraṇāya vinayaṃ /
K01vinsutru:6315: Vin_17.424 / na buddhavacanaṃ chandasi pade krame vā tatparāyaṇatayāropya paṭhita u[d]gṛhṇītad vahiḥ [64a4] śāstrāṇi samarthaḥ parasaṃjñapane anu[t]sṛjan buddhavacanābhiyogam* /
K01vinsutru:6326: Vin_17.434 / ārṣā gāthāṃ bhāṣaṇenainām abhimukhaṃ sthitvā saṃbo[64a5]dhyachaṭāśabdenāyanaprāpto 'nugṛhṇī[tā] /
K01vinsutru:6329: Vin_17.437 / tadbhāṇḍa samutsṛjya śastrakośaṃ sūcīgṛhakaṃ melaṃdukaṃ ca /
K01vinsutru:6330: Vin_17.438 / upatiṣṭhet kuśalaś cikitsayā tīrthyaṃ puṇyabhiprāyenānabhṛtikayā /
K01vinsutru:6332: Vin_17.440 / gacchet tadrūpeṣu pratyayeṣu prativihāre sāv upadrave vyapadiśya /
K01vinsutru:6339: Vin_17.447 / dahanam asya na cet saprāṇakavraṇatvaṃ /
K01vinsutru:6352: Vin_17.460 / arhatvam asya pravrajitānāṃ kalyāṇa[ñ] cet* /
K01vinsutru:6357: Vin_17.464 / phalaparimāṇaiḥ chatrair ekādhikair asya śravakānāṃ /
K01vinsutru:6358: Vin_17.465 / tathāgatapā[rśva]deśavaivṛttatā cet tasyāṃ diśi karaṇaṃ yatraiṣāṃ
K01vinsutru:6376: Vin_17.482 / siṃ*hadhvajo makaradhvajo nāgarājadhvajo vṛṣabhadhvaja iti /
K01vinsutru:6383: Vin_17.489 / na kaṇṭakānāṃ ropa[ṇa]ṃ nāgadantakānāṃ māsasaṃyojanāya dānam uttiṣṭhati /
K01vinsutru:6385: Vin_17.491 / noparidīpadānaṃ āgārikaiṣpūjanārtham adhirohaṇam abhāve śramaṇodd[e]śaiṣpādo prakṣālya gandhodakena /
K01vinsutru:6386: Vin_17.492 / na ced anena gandhair udvartya vastreṇa vā veṣṭayitvā śāstu saṃjñāmāmukhīkṛtyārtham abhidhyāya smṛtaiḥ /
K01vinsutru:6387: Vin_17.493 / teṣām api bhikṣubhi[64b6]r evam eva /
K01vinsutru:6397: Vin_17.502 / [65a1] // navakeṣv asya prāptiḥ paṃcabhiḥ nikāyaiḥ parivāradānaṃ /
K01vinsutru:6399: Vin_17.504 / vāditreṇaitadvādyamānena sār[d]vanyena ca mahatā sa[t]kāreṇa nirāvadyaṃ vādanāya kuru kuru bhoṣ puruṣa [śāstu]ḥ pūjām ity udīraṇam*
K01vinsutru:6401: ] sṛṅgāṭakeṣu śvaḥ paraśvo vā bhaviṣyattāyāṃ likhitasya iti buddhapraveśo bhaviṣyatīti bhujādāvāropitasya [65a2] hastiskandhe cha[tra]dhvajapatākāparivṛtasya
K01vinsutru:6403: Vin_17.507 / dhvajair asyāḥ parivāro vedikayāveṣṭanam* lohastambheś ca /
K01vinsutru:6406: Vin_17.510 / ābharaṇapratiyuktir utsṛjya pādābharaṇaṃ karṇapūraṃ ca /
K01vinsutru:6413: Vin_17.517 / abhisārasya niḥśritais taruṇavṛddheś ca nayanam* /
K01vinsutru:6415: Vin_17.519 / pālaśamudgakasya rathe karaṇaṃ gandhasamu[dga]kena samvidhānam* /
K01vinsutru:6417: Vin_17.521 / samāptāyāṃ pūjāyāṃ nirvṛteṣu vādyeṣu viprakrānte janakāye maṇḍanāpanamanam* /
K01vinsutru:6425: dhāraṇaṃ vipravāsaṃ ca sparśam agner nivārite /
K01vinsutru:6426: bhojanaṃ bījāghātaṃ ca deśe ca harite śuciḥ //
K01vinsutru:6427: utsargaṃ vṛkṣārohaś ca śaikṣā u[65a5]ddeśāyos saha /
K01vinsutru:6431: ityādy asyāntabhāg liṅga yāñcā bhāṇḍopabhugdrava kāmopabhoga saṃvāsānād
K01vinsutru:6436: vidhāraṇaṃ saptakaṃ dve cānye dhāraṇādhiṣṭhānoddhārānuddhāra iti //
K01vinsutru:6438: hitvānuddhṛto cānuśāṭī ca dvādaśaparṣya nalaṣaṭkaṃ cīvaraṃ
K01vinsutru:6441: [65b1] jatvaṅgulitalaromachannau ca karṇakagrahaṇe bhikṣoś ca vidyāpāṭhanamocana
K01vinsutru:6443: gṛhe channe layane mañce udvarttanamaṃcaka unmuroṭikā gandhapiṇyākataḥ /
K01vinsutru:6454: jñapanaṃ sekavākyañ ca satyavākyañ ca tadyathā /
K01vinsutru:6473: sīmnaḥ sāmragra dānaṃ ca poṣadhasya ca saptakaṃ //
K01vinsutru:6480: śākyabhikṣu dharmakīrttinā sattvārthe likhitaṃ śrīmad vikramaśilām āśritya
K01vinsutru:6482: gnur chos kyi grags pas bris pa /
K01vinsutru:6483: dpal ldan 'vyri krama śi lar dpye 'sla ra va la
K01vinsutru:6486: śī la a ka ra sa bris pa (= śīlākaraṇe likhitam)
K01vinsutru:6488: gnur dha rma kir tis bris pa jo ca myiṅi mkhan vuyin /
K01vinsutru:6489: etasya dharmakīrtter vaṇanaṃ debler sro po granthe /
